Supporting you when you quit smoking 🚭😀
Be free of nicotine addiction 🏆👍
recentChanges: 🛠️ Take advantage of new features with this version.
comments: Overall great, I have used it for 5 years, only downside is as I go longer without smoking don't need it as often so when I went in the update had erased all my data/progress which was a bit disappointing. Also the new badges are a bit silly used to have great goal related badges such as time and cigarettes not smoked, that helped when random cravings hit after years of not smoking, but who cares if you share on social media or use app for x hours. Not quite as good as it was originally.

I really liked the original version of this app - it had lots of relevant goals and achievements that were quite motivating. The new badge system is ridiculous - it rewards the user purely based on how much they use and promote the app, rather than on smoking related issues. For those really struggling to keep motivated, "congratulations, you've used this app 10 days in a row" is not remotely helpful, whereas "Congratulations, you've gained 10 more days life expectancy" is much more effective.
I've had this app for 3 years without issues. Then their latest update wiped my data and I lost everything and had to start over. Why couldn't you have migrated the data?
I like that i can track the money i save and how my over all health will improve by the day, week, and month
Does what it's suppose to, but after a few years since I purchased it, it does only have US$ currency because for some reason should be sold only in US I guess :(

title: Stop Tobacco Mobile Trainer. Quit Smoking App Free
description:
Would you like to quit smoking? If your answer is yes, you are making one of the best decisions in your life. Download the Stop Tobacco Mobile Trainer for free and start a new life!

Stop Tobacco Mobile Trainer is an application that will help you  gradually quit smoking with ease thanks to an online therapist whom will guide you at all times.

💚 Begin to recover your health and enjoy the benefits of quitting to smoke.💚

Stop Tobacco Mobile Trainer:

✔ We will combat the psychological and physical needs.
✔ We will improve your motivation and ability to quit.
✔ You will learn to control your anxiety and be able to cope with difficult situations, especially after quitting.
 
INITIAL EVALUATION 
In the initial phase you will find out your smoker profile, your level of physical addiction to nicotine and your consumption habits. 
This information will allow us to develop a complete personalized program that is adapted to your real needs as a smoker.

THE PROGRAM
After the initial evaluation is completed you will be able to access your personalized treatment program.

Everyday you will complete 4 tasks:

✔ The challenge of the day
✔ Reflections and myths
✔ Guess 
✔ Final review of the day

The daily tasks will help you to gradually change your smoking habits and eliminate the mental barriers that prevent you from taking the step to quit.

RELAXATION AND CRISIS
The relaxation guide will teach you simple skills on how to relax and control anxiety.
The  Crisis section is designed for those moments when you don't want to smoke but are having extreme cravings to do so, especially after D-day.

Stop Tobacco Mobile Trainer is the best free App to quit smoking. Thousands of users have already quit with our program. If they can do it,  you can too!

Stop Tobacco Mobile Trainer has been developed with the collaboration of the University of Las Palmas of Gran Canaria by health care providers specialized in tobacco use and health. The program has received the endorsement of the Official College of Psychologists of Las Palmas University (COP Las Palmas) and of the director of the University Foundation of the Canary Islands.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Love this app! Easy to use. Strong, positive messages. Very straightforward. Well worth paying the $5.99 to get rid of the ads.
This app is excellent. I look forward to opening it up and doing the challenges and activities.

I used this in conjunction with another app called SmokeFree three years ago and quit after 15 years of smoking! Unfortunately due to new stress (obvious ones at that) I've started again and am once more using this and the other app to kick the habit. The only thing I would like different (and why I only gave four stars) is for the days to follow the time in your time zone and move forward to the next day at midnight!

Hi l just installed your app . I'd like to suggest a different technic of quitting that you can add to your app . For example if someone smokes twice an hour , you can make a plan of smoking once an hour for some days and then once two hours and so on until no ciggaretts . Just saying 😊 ... Hi again i was just reading my message that l sent you more than a month ago .. now l am clean it's been one month and one day . I'd like to tell you thank you it wouldn't happen and be possible without you

I like this app very much. Unlikely other apps to quit smoking this one gives you the right perspective and really understand your struggle and feelings. It keeps you engaged throughout the whole program, so you don't miss the focus on the final goal which is improve yourself and your life. Thank you very much for that! It'd be nice to have a diary section where to record thoughts (which is needed at the end of the program) and to consult the daily graph instead of see it once at the end of day.

title: Breathe Easy Smoking Cessation
description:
The Breathe Easy Smoking Cessation Mobile App was developed by Northern Saskatchewan Breathe Easy (NSBE) which is a commercial tobacco reduction initiative implemented by the Northern Inter-Tribal Health Authority and its Partners (Prince Albert Grand Council, Meadow Lake Tribal Council, Peter Ballantyne Cree Nation, and Lac La Ronge Indian Band).  
NSBE is implemented under the First Nations and Inuit Component of the Federal Tobacco Control Strategy. 

Tobacco misuse continues to be the cause of a number of preventable chronic diseases leading to premature death in Canada. Tobacco use is a barometer for social inequities and by extension health disparities. Poverty, inadequate housing, welfare policies and general disadvantage lead to and link to tobacco use. 
The overall goal of the NSBE is that Northern Saskatchewan communities will be free of commercial tobacco misuse while being respectful of the traditional use of tobacco. While traditional tobacco is used for spiritual, cultural and ceremonial purposes, commercial tobacco is very harmful to our health. 

The App is designed to give the users all the information they needed to know about commercial tobacco and also traditional tobacco. 
The information aspect include: traditional tobacco, effects of commercial tobacco and strategies to help the user quit smoking.
There are information on the healthy rewards of quitting as well as the economic benefits.
The fitness aspect helps the user to track progress depending on the quitting strategy chosen. it also shows the amount saved as the user reduces the number/quantity  tobacco consumed.
Damages done by cigarettes/ smokeless tobacco to your body
Economic benefits of quitting

title: Quit Smoking Now: Quit Buddy!
description:
I’m a ex-smoker myself, I know how hard it is to quit smoking and to stay clean. After I quit smoking I started to use some quit smoking apps. None of them did really helped me, what I needed was some support during the difficult moments.


I decided to spent my time on developing a app which would give ex-smokers the support they need during the difficult moments. I’m proud to introduce you the “Quit smoking buddy” app. 


With our easy to use setup walk through you can start using the app in seconds. The “Quit smoking buddy” app will show you how long it’s been since your last cigarette. The app will also shows you how much cigarettes you didn’t smoked and how much money you have saved! Quit smoking will feel like a game when you complete our health goals and accomplish your achievements! 


What makes the “Quit smoking buddy” app really special is your personal quit coach! Choose the level of support you need and receive daily support from your personal quit smoking coach. A life without smoking will become a realistic and reachable goal! Quit smoking today and let the Quit smoking Buddy coach help you!


★ Check out the app functions: 


✓ Get daily support from our quit smoking coach.
✓ Complete the health goals.
✓ Accomplish your achievements.
✓ Share your results with friends on Facebook. 
✓ Shows: How many days since you’ve quit, how much money you have saved, the amount of cigarettes not smoked. 


Our goal is to become the number 1 quit smoking app worldwide and to support as many ex-smokers as possible.
 

★ Are you satisfied with our free app? Take a look at Quit smoking Buddy Pro. This app offers 100 days of coach support at different levels. 


★ What extra options does our paid App offer?


✓ Choose the level of coach support you need.
✓ Get up to 100 days of support.
✓ Add your own personal achievements.
✓ More health goals to accomplish.
✓ 100% Ad-free.

I will update my review as soon as the issue is resolved. The app has been really helpful so far, but it would be nice to be able to use it more often and properly.

Wastes too much time, you get asked to upgrade to the pro version everytime you open the app and can't get past this screen without going to the app store and back everytime. There are much better free Apps available.

well I think after paying for it and no pro its a scam this application has no proof of existance people chatting are probably chatting in ghost room which means they havent realized they are pawns I think delete this programme until further notice
Loving this app has helped me heaps
This app is ookay, in my opinion as a coach buddy its not so much it offers a daily tip. That is not a coach buddy.

And more
summary: Clear your lungs not your wallet
comments: This is hands-down the best free smoking cessation app I have ever used. It creates a personal dashboard showing how your health is improving, the money you've saved, and how long you've been a non-smoker (to the second!). Additionally, there is a chat feature (also free) where you can connect with people all over who are on this journey with you. Absolutely fantastic.

simple and easy to use. i do wish it had a video game part like ive seen on other apps like this. they are really great for getting ya through a craving. also there doesnt seem to be a slip up function if you have one cigarette. but if youre looking for simple tracking this is it.

got this to help support my partner. He was on thirty a day no filters for 18 years. breathing, coughing , snoring. everything was effected. couldn't stop previously, using patches for one week and this app He is now off them for three weeks. app gives you updated on stats and progress. It's excellent

I love this App! Love the widget and the color themes. Needs a journal. Has a wonderful community. Private messaging would be nice. And a game distractor, for urges. This has been a big help for me on my quit Journey, being able to track my progress fully!❤
Great app, simple and to the point. The best feature is the fact that you can see how your health improves in areas that might otherwise go unnoticed.

title: Smoke - quit
descriptionHTML:
The most important thing we have is our health. We are for a healthy lifestyle!
Smokers don't pass it by!
"Smoke - quit!" is the best way to quit Smoking. This app contains lot's of things to help You quit Smoking and forget about the nicotine addiction once and for all:
- counter statistics before quitting smoking (number of cigarettes smoked, spent on cigarettes money total weight and length of all cigarettes smoked over a specified period of Smoking before making the decision to quit Smoking);
- counter statistics after Smoking cessation (number of unlit cigarettes, the savings of time and money, nicotine and tar in your body);
- indication of restoration of health and the body after Smoking (visually and in real time shows you how your body is recovering after quitting Smoking);
- interesting and motivating facts about Smoking, the dangers of Smoking, tips to quit Smoking;
- smart, simple, and nice interface.
summary: A healthy lifestyle without cigarettes and nicotine.Let's Quit Smoking together!
recentChanges: AndroidX support
comments: A lot of health and factual information about quitting. The count up to how much money saved and other stats are great. By far the best quitting app.
This app has health and tracking. Everything o wanted. It's great 😊
Great app to kill nervous moments
Useful application for smokers.
Very encouraging app,

title: quitSTART - Quit Smoking
description:
quitSTART is a free app made for people who want to quit smoking. This app takes the information you provide about your smoking history and gives you tailored tips, inspiration, and challenges to help you become smokefree and live a healthier life. 

quitSTART helps you: 
• Get ready to quit with tips and information to prepare you for becoming smokefree
• Monitor your progress and earn badges for smokefree milestones and other achievements 
• Get back on track if you slip and smoke
• Manage cravings and bad moods in healthy ways
• Distract yourself from cravings with games and challenges
• Store helpful tips, inspirations, and challenges in your Quit Kit
• Share your progress and favorite tips through social media

quitSTART is a product of Smokefree.gov, a smoking cessation resource created by the Tobacco Control Research Branch at the National Cancer Institute in collaboration with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and input from tobacco control professionals, smoking cessation experts, and ex-smokers.

summary: quitSTART can help you track your behavior to become and stay smokefree.
recentChanges: Updated notifications with new messages
comments: The app is poorly put together. Words and number cut off in certain sections, there's no real "how to", if you have ADHD, good lucky,, because there's no real organization in this app. It's all over the place, and its not even visually appealing.
App is OK, wish I could edit it. Do not know yet if I am going to keep it, there are a lot of apps that are not so frustrating to use.

The "I'm Great" section won't show what I'm typing, it has a place to type, but all I can see is fragments of letters. I can add photos, just have to copy and paste what I want put there. Also, the "Money Saved" hasn't moved at all, even though I went from a pack a day to 9 puffs (lowest so far!) a day. Other than that, I really do like the app. The reminders and check-ins are helpful. It's like a quit-coach you can carry in your pocket!

I am only giving this 2 stars because it is inaccurate. My stats were showing slips when there were none, and there is no ability to edit for correction. How the positive affirmations pop up when I requested them to at times were not helpful as I could not open them, just saw it as a brief notification and it was gone. I uninstalled withing 2 days of downloading.

bugs need to be fixed!!! this app is actually quite helpful, the tips, the reminders & check ins all help keep me on track. But one of the great features the cravings & slips part doesnt work! so instead of being proud that I'm having cravings but not slipping, it shows that im slipping every time I enter 0 in the slips category. Its discouraging instead of encouraging. Fix this & I'll give you 5 stars. otherwise it's enough to make me want to uninstall it and find another app.

title: SmoQuit - quit smoking
description:
Do you wish something that would replace only the cigarette but keep the smoking habit?

This app wants to challenge the way of quitting smoking by replacing the real cigarette with a simulated one, which takes the same amount of time as a real one to "smoke". You can keep a track of how many real cigarettes you replaced with a simulated one, and won't have to give up those smoke breaks.
Want to quit smoking and you tried all the existing methods you have heard of? Quitting cold turkey didn't help me either, because after 2 or 3 days, I was back to buying a new pack of cigarettes and smoking half of it in one day, because I felt that I deserved to. 

 But with this app, you can trick your brain into thinking that you are smoking, because:
- App will tell you to synchronize your breathing with the virtual cigarette, so you get the feeling that you're still inhaling the smoke
- Don't lose the flicking of the cigarette habit, because the app gives you the option to flick the ash off of it (also tricks are available)
- The time spent for smoking the virtual cigarette is similar to the real one, so you still get those smoking breaks that you are used to
- May not be for everyone, but if you still have a familiar feeling by seeing an ash tray, this is also included in the app :)
- Get rewards when you replace enough cigarettes

For many people, the habit of smoking just boils down not to the tobacco or nicotine within the cigarettes, but the feeling that you are in charge of your time, or you take advantage of the time to reflect and to think about current issues or problems. Or either for socializing with other people :) No matter the purpose, every smoker who tries to quit will miss that feeling they had when they took a smoking break. 

If you tried already giving up smoking, you know that you have to occupy your time with something to distract you, and to not think about lighting another cigarette. Well with this app, this would be easier, because it will occupy your time with something that you're already familiar with, the habbit of smoking without the cigarettes.

Try it every time you go for a smoking break, and instead of lighting a real cigarette, start smoking one in the app, and there will be at least one cigarette less in your lungs, and one more in the app.

Good luck quitting smoking! And remember, giving up bad habits is not actually quitting, because quitting is just a easy way out. What you are doing is remarkable!

recentChanges: App crashing problem fixed
comments: I really like that the app is visual and the virtual ashtray has a positive impact on the regular smoker(you can see how much dirt you inhale when you actually smoke). The fact that the virtual cigar is also slowly smoking is a nice touch. In the future it would be very nice to add the posibility so see also how much money you saved.

Nice improvements bro!! But where's my bin? :D also, the breath in prompt is not very visible when pressing the cigarette for smoking as the thumb gets in the way, could it be displayed on top of the cigarette?

title: Tobacco Cessation
description: Bangladesh is one of the high tobacco consumption countries in the world.  Unlike many other countries, Bangladeshi population use both smoking tobacco mainly cigarette and biri and smokeless tobacco products such as zarda, gul, sada pata. It is reported that about 70 percent of smokers visit a physician each year and 70 percent also reported a desire to quit and make at least one serious attempt to do so and tobacco cessation service has not evolved in Bangladesh as expected. Physicians have less time in counseling for tobacco cessation in the country like Bangladesh. So, Tobacco Cessation mobile app could play a vital role to reduce the tobacco use in Bangladesh.

This app is very informative. Contains instructions to follow to minimize

title: Smoke Timer - Quit Smoking
description:
Choose a purpose (reduce or give up), determine the time when you want to achieve the result and go! Everything is simple!
Be honest with yourself and do not set unrealistic deadlines.
Depending on your settings, the application will determine the time of smoking and signal about it. It is also possible to do this sooner or even skip the smoking break.
The application will insensibly reduce the number of cigarettes smoked. You can follow your progress in the Statistics menu.
A good bonus of the application is a calculator of your savings. You can also enter the required amount and choose what exactly you want to spend this money on.
We will not scare you with information about the dangers of smoking. You already know that!

Great work..if you want to give up smoking then this app is what you need
Tiên ích rất tốt, sẽ làm cho cuộc sống tốt đẹp hơn rất nhiều khi bạn bỏ được thuốc lá

title: How to quit smoking
description:
Whether you've been smoking for few weeks, few months, or if you smoked for half of your life, you've questioned yourself this a zillion of times: how to quit smoking? This is a common topic between people who struggle with smoking cigarettes. A good portion of people have been trying to quit smoking for at least 5 times in their "smoking career", and there's only two possible outcomes: to continue and never try to stop smoking again, or to quit it without any doubts or regrets.

As there are many benefits of quitting smoking, there are also physical cons of it. Someone who never smoked in their life can easily say "Just do it" or similar short thoughts like this one, but in reality, that's just another thought of a non-smoker. How to stop smoking is one of the biggest challenges when it comes to cutting bad habits, similar to saying no to drugs, which are illegal in most parts of the world. A non-smoker would always say this is something which is present in mind only, but every single person who smoked for enough time would disagree with this fact, with a reason.

Nicotine is a chemical substance which is one of the main "ingredients" of cigarettes, and it causes brain addiction, which after some time goes to lungs addiction, which actually is physical. Every smoker knows who tough it can get with the physical feelings if they didn't have a cigarette in certain amount of time. So in the end, how to quit smoking effectively once we're familiar with all of these facts?

There are many reasons to quit smoking. One of the most important reasons are health issues which in most cases developer over time, and they don't spare not a single smoker. Some people need more time to developer health difficulties, and some people need less time, depending on the body structure, and also genetics. Some smokers are eager to diseases, and smoking is really bad for building and keeping your immunity on a high level, which is also an important factor in fighting various diseases and infections in your body. 

You will become more aware of what's bad and what's good by reading this how to stop smoking guide. We've assembled most important factors and aspects of quitting smoking procedures for you, and put it in one place, according to people's experiences and advices given by professionals in this field. You'll learn how to quit smoking easy, by distracting yourself from bad thoughts, and engaging time as one of your best buddies in the whole procedure of quitting smoking easily. It might not have sense now, but please take a peek into it, and see it for yourself.

Every day spent without a cigarette is another win for a person like you who decided to make one of the best decisions in their life. After an adequate amount of time, you'll be passing the information you learned from our app to other smokers who are in desperate need to learn how to quit smoking effectively, by providing them with these useful guides and letting them know they are not alone.

Good luck!

title: myQuitTime - Stop Smoking
description:
Stop smoking and reward yourself with the money saved!

Create a shopping list, add photos and prices, and let the app tell you when you can afford a treat from your saved smoking money.

See your health benefits increasing daily.

Press the big HELP button for inspiration to keep you going.

We believe in you, now you just have to believe in yourself!

myQuitTime is an Android app designed to help keep non-smokers on the path to success through inspiration and targeted incentives.

If you've already stopped smoking, fantastic! Well done. You can use myQuitTime to provide the inspiration and incentive to keep you a successful non-smoker.

If you haven't stopped smoking yet, you are about to enter a new world where everything is better, brighter, and much more wonderful. myQuitTime can not only help you stop smoking, but it can make the process easy and enjoyable.

myQuitTime displays the following information about your Quit Statistics:
- Years, Months, Days, Hours, Minutes, and Seconds since you stopped smoking.
- How much money you have saved since you stopped smoking.
- How many cigarettes you haven't smoked since you stopped smoking.
- How much of your life you have potentially saved since you stopped smoking.
- Your current Health Improvements Status.

myQuitTime has a big red HELP button for those occasional moments of weakness. Just click the button and the app will display an Inspirational Message to help you through.

myQuitTime has a shopping list for you to choose some rewards that you would like to spend your money on instead of wasting it on cigarettes. The app will tell you how long it will take you to save for each item, and how long you have to wait until you can treat yourself.

comments: The links to email feedback don't work. The app is very simplistic but my biggest complaint is that the background features a big plume of smoke which seems out of touch for an app to help to quit smoking.

Encouraging health facts stating the benefits of being smoke free. Easy to use countdown clock. Helpful reminders when you feel your resolve slipping. Additionally you can post your statistics to social media sites. This is an awesome quit smoking tracker. 🚭

I tried it and it didnt seem to help, but my neice has used it successfully, and has been smoke free for over a month now. She encouraged me to try it again but it will not let me reset my origional settings, so its useless to me
It's what I was looking for; a simple tracker. I'd like the background to be changed to something other than smoke.
i saw someone post they couldn't edit their information on a second install and i am here to tell you that is wrong. you can edit in settings and save the changes. the app is great

title: Quit4GoodLife ( Smoking Cessation - Quit Smoking )
description:
Did you know used together "behavioral support" and "medication" quadruples your chances of successfully quitting?

	Quit4GoodLife is a Behavioral Support Intervention Program backed by 4 traditional theoretical perspectives...aka science. Using the Quit4GoodLife App with prescribed medication will give you the highest chance that your quit attempt will be successful.
	We have researched hundreds of scientific papers and have conducted observational studies and reviews on several popular products currently on the market. We have identified what works and what doesn't. 
	Quit4GoodLife uses a science-based motivational approach, created in collaboration with scientists from the National Institute of Health (NIH), to help you quit smoking for good by gradually guiding you in the process of reducing your smoking habit. This app personalizes your quit attempt. You can set personal goals and receive daily alerts to keep you on track with your Quit Path. Download this app and Quit smoking for Good today!
App features: 
    - Invite your friends and loved ones to support you on your journey.
    - Set and track your goals.
    - Utilize the Quit4GoodLife Widget to log your daily smoking habit (please make sure to enable the Quit4GoodLife widget on your phone by adding it to your widget list). 
    - See how much money you have saved by not smoking that next cigarette.
    - Share your personal daily Journal with your support team
    - Write on your feature rich "public wall" and/or post a comment on your friend's "public wall".
    - Monitor your daily cigarette intake, receive weekly & monthly reports, and watch your progress.
    - Access the latest smoking cessation resources and studies through the library.

Give it a try and give us feedback to make it better for you.

Please send us your feedback and any comments/suggestions. Feel free to email us directly at info@personclinic.net.

- See how much money you have saved by not smoking that next cigarette.
- Share your personal daily Journal with your support team
- Write on your feature rich "public wall" and/or post a comment on your friend's "public wall".
- Monitor your daily cigarette intake, receive weekly & monthly reports, and watch your progress.
- Access the latest smoking cessation resources and studies through the library.

Give it a try and give us feedback to make it better for you.

Please send us your feedback and any comments/suggestions. Feel free to email us directly at info@personclinic.net.
summary: Quit4GoodLife is an evidence-based smoking intervention / cessation solution.
developerAddress: 12430 Park Potomac Ave , suite 444, Potomac, MD 20854

Requires access to my contacts. No. Uninstalled.

This app is so useful and it helps a lot to stop smoking. definitely I am going to recommend this app to others.
Can't read text on popup. Uninstalled 10 minute after installation!

title: Tobano - quit smoking
description:
You've just quit smoking or you're about to quit, congratulations!! Tobano is there to support you in your approach and help you stay motivated. All features of the app are completely FREE to use 😃

Like a game, you progress by unlocking levels as well as achievements telling you the benefits of stopping cigarettes on your body.

You can track your progress real-time thanks to many encouraging statistics (money saved since you stopped smoking, time since the stop, number of non-smoked cigarettes ...)

Of course, you can share your successes with your family, friends, colleagues via Facebook, Twitter and other social networks!

As bonuses and to encourage you to hold on when you get a urge to smoke, you have access to cards containing motivational messages accessible at all times.

Tobano helps you stop smoking in German, English, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Portuguese.

title: Quitbit - Help to Reduce & Gradually Quit Smoking
description:
The Quitbit app tracks your smoking, allows you to visualize your trends, provides a community for support and empowers you to cut back and quit smoking. 

This program built by smokers and ex-smokers motivates you and lets you take the proper steps to cut back or quit immediately!

Use the app to track all your smoking and learn from your habits. Your time since last cigarette is shown so you can challenge yourself to hold out just a bit longer. The unique spider graph tells you when you’re smoking most during the day. Figure out which of these cigarettes you’re just smoking out of routine, and cut out the ones you don’t really need. Use the history feature to celebrate your progress as you quit smoking!

Use the app anytime you smoke, however you want.

Features:
• Tracks all your smoking
• Set completely custom plans to quit
• See how long it’s been since your last cigarette
• Figure out exactly how much money you're saving by not smoking
• Learn when during the day you’re smoking most to cut out the unnecessary cigarettes
• Celebrate your progress with a built in community 
• Motivation from www.QuitbitLighter.com

comments: The app alone is alright but it's designed to work with the Quitbit lighter and they don't sync properly. My phone says they are connected but when I click the app info sync button  (how many smokes I've had) it doesn't show on the lighter. ALSO if the lighter goes out of Bluetooth range, when it comes back in range it should automatically connect and sync the info. It doesn't do that. You have to manually reconnect the lighter in the Bluetooth settings on your phone. And once you do that it still doesn't sync the info.
Lighter works but the time is wrong and I can't track anything more than how many cigarettes I've smoked because the lighter will not sync whatsoever, essentially a $100+ bic lighter at this point
Took a minute to configure and was good to go.  We shall see if I can quit smoking. Will update later
Doesn't sync, crashes all the time and for some reason it manages also to drain the battery even when you don't use it.  Exactly like the Quitbit lighter, the app does too little too late!

title: You Can Quit Smoking
description:
You Can Quit Smoking is a simple, but effective educational application, which will help you quit smoking once and for all.

This free guide will list various reasons why to stop smoking cigarettes, it will tell you why quitting is hard, and what to expect when you quit smoking (a quit smoking “timeline”). It will also teach you about various (medically proven) quitting methods and how to prepare a quit plan.

Many smokers gain weight after they quit smoking, and they don’t know why – here you will find the reasons, and learn how to avoid this physical nicotine withdrawal symptom, in addition to other temporary mental and emotional symptoms (fatigue, depression, anxiety, etc.).

Also included are 8 high quality and very informative videos on this topic from YouTube.

Everyone can quit smoking and so can you. “If at first you don’t succeed, try, try again. Don't give up too easily; persistence pays off in the end.” -- Thomas H. Palmer

We wish you success and please feel free to write us anytime. We'd like to hear your feedback, suggestions or just a simple message, that you've made it!

title: No Smoking - The Best App to Quit Smoking
description:
The US Surgeon General has said, “Smoking cessation [stopping smoking] represents the single most important step that smokers can take to enhance the length and quality of their lives.” It’s hard to quit smoking, but you can do it. To have the best chance of quitting tobacco and staying quit, you need to know what you’re up against, what your options are, and where to go for help. You’ll find this information this application.

No smoking application will help you to stop smoking totally. This app will remind you every time. You will save money with this app. You will love life more with this app. You will be healthier.

Brought to you by the good folks at Creatively Smart

title: Quit Smoking
description:
Quit is a widget application designed to gradually wean you from dependency on cigarettes. Each individual's step-down program is calculated based on statistical data from other users, and it's continuously adjusted to your specific smoking pattern.

Install
1. Touch and hold an empty area of the home screen
2. Select "Widget"
3. Select "Quit (standard)"
or
1. Select "Menu"
2. Select tab "Widgets"
3. Select "Quit (standard)"

If you are on Android 4.0 and higher you can use one of the appropriate variants of installation

User satisfaction is invaluable for us. If the application does not work for you for any reason, please contact us at info@azati.com and we will work with you individually.

Please also visit http://quit.azati.com/

title: Cigarette Counter and Tracker
description:
Cigarette Counter is the easiest way to count cigarette use and calculate spending. You can track your smoking habit daily, weekly and monthly...

To count cigarette and record it just tap when you smoked. You can use the widget or app to record cigarette. Cigarette Counter will give you daily, weekly and monthly overview. You can also track your smoking habit on charts.

Cigarette Counter has a nice widget to count cigarette you smoked and track your daily smoking. It shows smoke free time and the total count you smoked in that day. Also, you can tap the button on the widget to record your cigarette quickly.

Features:
-Daily, weekly and monthly use and spending summary
-Time passed after last cigarette
-Widget to see daily use and quick add option
-Descriptive charts to track cigarette use and spending
-Nice looking dark theme

title: Quit Tobacco
description:
Quit Tobacco is an app that contains much more than the simple title can reflect. It is a motivating program that will encourage you to quit smoking, and continue moving in the right direction. 
Whether you are that have tried to quit before but failed, or this is your first attempt to quit and take back control of your life, Quit Tobacco will help you achieve your goal and adopt a healthy lifestyle. 
After deciding to quit tobacco the first 2 weeks is always the most difficult period, this app helps motivate and keep you on course during this period, and forever thereafter. After entering your data regarding your habit smoking, the app uses this information to show you the health benefits that occur within your body in relation to being smoke free.
Quit Tobacco makes it clear to see the benefits after stopping the habit by showing you your statisitics. Know exactly how much time and money you have saved since quitting. How many cigarettes you have avoided. Knowing this information serves as a great incentive to keep going and remain smoke free.
We understand that people are usually inclined to put away hard decisions. Whether you have decided to quit now or in the future, the motivator alarm serves to notify you daily with motivational quotes before and during the time you have quit.  The featured motivation section within Quit Tobacco is there to give you useful knowledge and techniques to help stop you from relapsing. There are tutorials on meditation, Neuro Linguistic Programming and a variety of topics to educate yourself and stand a better chance of staying on track.
Features:
Health - shows what happens to your body without tobacco
Statistics - shows time since quit 
                 - shows time wasted from smoking
                 - shows life gained (or time saved)
                 - shows money saved from cigarettes
                 - shows avoided cigarettes, tar, nicotine and carbon monoxide
	
Motivation – informative articles with useful methods and techniques to help you quit your habit of smoking
Motivator Alarm – notifies you at your desired time with a daily motivational quote

title: Quit Tracker: Stop Smoking
description:
Are you trying to quit smoking and want to boost your motivation in this regard? Quit Tracker is here to offer you a high quality app that helps you figure out how much money you can save simply by stopping smoking. The app will also enable you to how much time you spent without cigarettes and it will also let you know the amount of life you regained by not smoking.

Motivational Health Section
★ Countdown timer to watch all aspects of your health improve as a result of your great decision to stop this bad habit of smoking.


Stop Smoking Slowly Mode
★ You cant quit smoking now because the nicotine dependance is too strong? no problem!
Easy Quit has an entire "Slow Mode" to help you stop smoking slowly.
It will create a customised plan for you to become smoke free with no pain or stress. It also has up to 5 reminders to help you stick to the quitting plan and successfully quit your nicotine addiction.


Money Statistics
★ Watch your pockets grow and see how much money you saved by not smoking any cigarettes.
★ Set a nice treat for yourself let the app help you see how long until you reach it. This will motivate you and help you stay smoke free.

Cravings & Trigger Statistics
★ Pie Chart showing you the breakdown of your top triggers to help you eliminate your cravings fasters.

Matching-Pairs Game
★ Have an urge to smoke a cigarette? Let EasyQuit help you by providing a cool game of Matching-Pairs with beautiful icons to pass the scientifically proven 3 minute mark & beat your urge to smoke a cigarette.




Badges
★ Earn up to 57 different badges as rewards and use them as a motivational tool. They can also help you stay strong against the nicotine addiction if you share your progress with your friends through the screenshot option provided by EasyQuit.


Themes
★ Personalise EasyQuit by choosing any of the +30 beautiful themes provided.


Personal Motivations
★ Get even more personal by creating your own motivations and have the application randomly remind you of them to keep you positive and help you stay on track.



High Level of Privacy
★ No log in, no collection or selling of your sensitive data like email, password or contacts. Your data is saved locally on your phone.


Beautiful Design
★ Beautiful & original design consistent with the modern google material design guidelines.
★ 2 Awesome widgets to put on your home screen and always see the money you saved & time passed since you stopped smoking.

This is the perfect motivational tool for those that want to break this bad habit right now but find it hard to do so. A great motivator here is the Health tab where you can see the positive effects that quitting has on your body. Thankfully, you will also be able to track the progress and see how close you are to become smoke free.

title: Drop It! Quit Smoking
description:
Tired of smoking?
You want back your health, money, self-control..
Drop It! is there to hold your hand and remind you about the effort you're making so your clothes can stop smelling! 
You tried to stop this horrible addiction?
You tried everything to quit smoking but your efforts were unsuccessful? 
This app tries to motivate you a bit more!
Quitting nicotine is a challenge, but you can treat it like a game.
Drop It! is an app that provides you with the support you need when you quit smoking :

• Detailed statistics to have a better perspective of your addiction.
> This application adapts you and provides many statistics (money saved, days without tobacco, no smoked cigarettes, time saved by not smoking, end of your physical dependence...).

• Your health, your priority.
> Want to know what are the benefits of your stop smoking? Drop It! gives you information related to your health as targets to complete. For example: did you know that after two days without tobacco, smell and taste improve?

• Keep it simple!
> This application is lightweight and easy to configure. The configuration should not take you more than 30 seconds. After all, quitting smoking should not be a fuss!

• Tell the world that smoking is finished!
> Encourage your smoking friends and reassure your parents. You can share your stats and medals by email, SMS, or social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google+ ...).

• Drop It! is created with love.
> I am trying to improve this app all the time. But time resource is constantly lacking :\ This is my side project as I also have a full time job.. Sorry for those ads btw, but my home country is not supported for merchant account on Google Play so I can’t put donations inside my app. This is the only way I can try to get some money for the beer..

Abstinence is a method that can work. It depends of your motivation and how you stop smoking. Using an application like Drop It! can make your tobacco withdrawal more enjoyable because you will feel like playing.

Do not hesitate to ask for help, turn to your loved ones or a tobacco specialist for example.

Think of your health, be master of your destiny and choose the end of your story ...

I wish you a great success! ;)

title: Cigarette Counter | Quit smoking | Don't smoke
description:
You want to eliminate cigarettes, cigarettes, smoke or nicotine from your life. This app will help you, keep track of your consumption, see how much you spend, reduce your consumption and see how the graphs go down.

This app is very simple and will calculate your daily consumption of cigarettes, you just have to write them down, if you do not write them down better, that means you are quitting smoking, it has a timer from your last cigarette smoked.

You know, smoking is bad for your life. Even so, people still smoke. Why should you quit? When you quit smoking, you gain life, both your own and those around you.

We know that quitting smoking is very hard, getting out of the smoke is quite complex, but right now is the best thing you can do, if you don't smoke your body is more prepared to respond against diseases that affect your lungs, every cigarette you smoke and point at the app makes you more vulnerable.

This app invites you to quit smoking. It motivates you to quit by showing you how much you smoke and how much it is costing you. Quitting smoking is more understandable when you focus on how you are starting to quit.

When you start pointing out fewer cigarettes in the app, you will feel healthier and stronger, plus you will have more money, because you will be saving.

Your status as an ex-smoker. When you quit smoking, you have to focus on yourself. Indicate how long you've been quitting, how many times you've gone without smoking, how much money you've saved, and how many cigarettes you've given up. 

Start today to quit smoking with this application, which calculates your progress and the cost of continuing to smoke.

title: ISMOKAY - QUIT SMOKING
description:
Ismokay is here to help you quit smoking.
Our purpose is to be side by side with you whatever your moment of life, whether while you still want to consume for some time, reduce gradually or stop at once.
We are not here to show you how many cigarettes you didn’t smoke, how much money you have saved, how many minutes of life you have earned. Our purpose is your transformation as a human being, living well with yourself, happy for your new attitudes and free for an even better life.

We offer multiple journeys and Behavioral Changes that when applied together, present a huge potential to transform the lives of those who apply them. Learn more and see which one suits you best.

JOURNEYS:
CONSCIOUS SMOKING: This journey is made for those who like to smoke, know that it’s necessary to reduce it, but is not ready yet to quit or wants to continue consuming for some time. Here you’ll create your weekly consumption table with the reduction table you want. Then you just follow the plan and over time, make adjustments based on your evolution.

SCHEDULED REDUCTION: This is an intermediate journey, in which you define what level your consumption starts and, each week at your own pace, you may reduce your consumption table the way you want. As the days and weeks goes by and based on your performance, you will have reached zero consumption and then go straight to the next journey.

QUIT SMOKING: This journey is for those who wants to quit smoking or will quit now, right after downloading Ismokay. It’s an important journey to avoid relapses, presenting motivational content and keeping up with you in order to strengthen you even more.
Feel free to choose the journey that best fits your moment of life. You may change your journey at any time, at your own pace, without pressure and being always in control of the the situation.


BEHAVIORAL CHANGES:
In addition to the multiple journeys, our methodology involves the concept of BEHAVIORAL CHANGES, scientifically proven in several studies related in our website, with exclusive contents about meditation, exercise practice, stretching, nourishment, well-being, knowledge and praying. All prepared by our curators with experience in each proposed theme.

We have a dedicated team behind the App producing new contents continuously to motivate you for a better quality of life, free from cigarette cravings  and even with more disposal. After starting your journey your life will be much better. The exclusive Behavioral Changes content,  when  applied, have a transformative potential for anyone's life.
Each week your performance will be evaluated and you will have your results compared to the other users of the Ismokay community. You'll evaluate the progress of your journey, and the more you advance in Behavioral Changes and indicators, the more you’ll be ready to quit smoking. Your performance during the application of our methodology will be used, in a grouped and anonymous way, to generate scientific studies on smoking habits, helping the entire scientific community. All this to further improve our methodology and our purpose in pursuit of more health.

The time is now! The challenge is what moves us forward!

Learn more at www.ismokay.com

title: Quit Smoking Timer - Smoke less, quit your habit!
description:
A no gimmicks, simple, effective and reliable app to track your smoking habit and help you keep it under control, cut down and/or quit.

Notification widget so you can track your current smoke free period without even having to unlock your phone.

24Hour or AM/PM time format.

Pro version has aditional features including:

* Ad free
* Set goals to gradually increase your smoke free periods which will help wean you off at your own pace and subsequently make it easier to quit if you decide to do so.
* History showing stats about your smoke free periods and progress.

title: Quit it - Stop Smoking!
description:
This application is here to motivate people who decides stop smoking. It is easy to use application with good looking UI to visualize your progress! It is hard to make this decision, but when you do, you need to keep moving. To keep moving you need to see what you have managed! With Quit it - Stop Smoking! you will see your progress.

With visualizing health progress it will be informing you about your health, while allowing you to set targets while you are accomplishing them! 

This application will be here to help and motivate. Together we are going to improve this application. 

While you are walking at this tough road, I am hoping that, this application will be one of your friends who will keep you walking! 

You made a great decision for healthy life, keep moving!

With this amazing app, now you will be able to see how many cigarette did you smoke, the quantity of additives in cigarette and how much of each additive is now in your body.

With the help of this app, it is not difficult now to quit smoking. As it shows the poison you took into your body. Once you realize what and how much poison did you took, it will make sense how this little gun is killing you from inside.

title: Quit Smoking - MindCotine
description:
- 🥽 Head-mounted VR Display: We send your own VR display to keep - use with just your smartphone.
- 🤖 VR Experiences: Immerse into real-like situations to gain control over your smoke cravings.
- 👤 Personal Coach: One-to-one coaching with a therapist with several years in habit change training.
- 🧠 Mindfulness Meditation: Deep-rooted recovery with curated meditation and breath-work.
- 📓 Smoke Diary: Track your smoke frequency patterns.
- ⛔ Craving Stopper: Instant relief activities to fight moments of strong craving.
- 💬 Community Chatroom: Anonymously share your story, inspire, learn, and connect.
- 🗓️ Quit Date: Pick a date you want to quit on. We can work towards that together.
- 📈 Money Saved Calculator: Live calculator of money saved when you did not smoke.
- ✍️ Self-Help Handbook: Collection of tips and tricks from scientific research. Knowledge is power!.

The FREE BASIC version gives you a fairly good feel of the app.

If you want to go all in, the PREMIUM version (includes VR + Coaching) comes at a small price to quit for good!.

title: Quit with Bella
description:
Bella is your personal stop smoking coach. 

Quitting smoking is really tough, but it can be the best thing you ever do! Quitting smoking will help you live a longer, happier, and healthier life! Bella understands how difficult it is to achieve this, and also understands what it takes to achieve this.

Bella will be there for you all the time, whenever you need her. 1am after a difficult day and you want someone to talk to? Need extra motivation during the day? Don’t know how to get started and want some expert guidance? Bella is fully trained to be there with you in these moments. 

Get Started!

Download the app and start talking to Bella. Talk in a completely natural way. Advanced artificial intelligence allows you to have a fluid and human like conversation with Bella. 

Continue to converse with Bella. Bella will use knowledge from hundreds of smoking cessation experts, the NHS Centre for Smoking Cessation and Training (NCSCT)/National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) evidence-guidelines, and service users to provide a personalized response to your situation.

Enter Bella Community! Join a community of people supporting each other to be smokefree for life! Express how you are feeling, support others through comments and smiles, and become the permanent ex-smoker you want to be!

title: Smoke - quit Pro
descriptionHTML:
The most important thing we have is our health. We are for a healthy lifestyle!
Smokers don't pass it by!
"Smoke - quit!" is the best way to quit Smoking. This app contains lot's of things to help You quit Smoking and forget about the nicotine addiction once and for all:
- counter statistics before quitting smoking (number of cigarettes smoked, spent on cigarettes money total weight and length of all cigarettes smoked over a specified period of Smoking before making the decision to quit Smoking);
- counter statistics after Smoking cessation (number of unlit cigarettes, the savings of time and money, nicotine and tar in your body);
- indication of restoration of health and the body after Smoking (visually and in real time shows you how your body is recovering after quitting Smoking);
- interesting and motivating facts about Smoking, the dangers of Smoking, tips to quit Smoking;
- smart, simple, and nice interface, various interface styles;
- personal achievements;
- no ads
-statistics in future
summary: A healthy lifestyle without cigarettes and nicotine.Let's Quit Smoking together!
recentChanges: Datechange bug fix
comments: Tbh out of all of them this app is pretty epic. The chat is there but not in your face , the achievements and challenges etc are pretty ok compared. I would say can be buffed out abit , example recovery of Nero pathways etc. For quitting every health benefit people want to see , fact the icon is not a cigerette is the best. Other aps are pretty stupid on this front , who wants to see a cigerette when quitting ? Try it , just needs more achievements and pro mixed into correct catagory once u pay

I have the pro version, love the clean layout. Awesome color schemes. All the features helpful on your quit journey; community, statics, facts, health and money saved and more .Would like to see a diary for writing thoughts and private messaging for one on one talk with other quitters, a widget and notifications. Great job developers!!❤👍👏
Awesome!!
Lots to keep me busy in the early stages of my quit.
Great stop smoking app.would defo recommend

comments: It's cool I'd prefer it to be more interactive as well as informative. Like when you quit it's common knowledge that you will have withdrawal symptoms but if a calendar was added. One with events it it would be possible for something like that. I've seen the diary may add dates and times with a notification that let's you remember to check it. Then the app considers that you literally had your last drink or a cigarette right at the moment you are setting it up and there is no way to put another date and time. And yeah, basically wherever you click in the app you are gonna get, guess what - an add. In 10 mins of using this app ive probably spent 7 on watching adds. Tnx but i jave a tv for that.

I think the app is very useful to keep track of habits and I also like the notes for encouragement. The only thing is it starts off the sobriety the minute you put in the tracker I have been sober abit longer even though i downloaded this app today it would be good to allow us to go back for how long we have been sober for. Otherwise great app

I would love this app way more if there was more than just smoking and drinking. There agree other addictions out there. I'll be uninstalling this app until you guys decide to add that. Otherwise, I think that it is a wonderful app. I'll change my rating if the app gets more addictions added.
Good tool... too many ads though. It's nice to see your progress in real time.

title: Quit Smoking, NeverSmoking M
description:
Real Quit Smoking, NeverSmoking Mild Version!

* Two Versions of NeverSmoking!

- Mild Version
NeverSmoking Mild is focused on changing facial expressions to change and remove emotional information about nicotine in the brain.
With mild contents, it is available without burden.

- Powerful Version
NeverSmoking Powerful consisted of more powerful contents to remove emotional information of nicotine in the brain.
It is effective, but it could be little uncomfortable to the beginner of NeverSmoking.

------

The world’s first, patented – The world’s only no anti-smoking therapy mobile application based on brain science!

Just simply follow what you see and quit smoking for good! – Within 30 days only, you will be surprised how easy quitting smoking can be.

NeverSmoking is an anti-smoking therapeutic program that has been developed by the SR Mind Institute through 6 years of research on 1,000 clinical trials on cognitive method of stop smoking. (It is not a simple smoking management App.)

NeverSmoking enables you to quit smoking permanently by removing the fundamental smoking-neuron which is an emotional information attracting thoughts of cigarette. 

NeverSmoking enables a powerful quitting smoking effect through activation of the mirror neurons through the innate facial recognition system of the brain, emotional priming through facial feedback and thoracic respiration. It is a safe yet a powerful therapy to quit smoking.

NeverSmoking removes the false reward system created by nicotine in the smoker’s brain and replaces it with a new synaptic connection

NeverSmoking enables the smoker to gain an accurate understanding of one’s addiction so that they can intelligently and systematically manage the smoking desires in order to make thoughts of tobacco to never recur and quit smoking permanently in a short period of time(usually within a month).

NeverSmoking is composed of 200 expressions and 21 topics and it runs based on automatic analysis of the smoker’s dispositions, patterns and terms of smoking and their sensorial characteristics.

It is designed so that the user can quit smoking by merely mimicking the contents on the screen.

NeverSmoking app is based on years of data and expert know-hows on smoking cessation.

With NeverSmoking, you will be able to quit smoking for good in the most healthy and fundamental way and you will never crave smoking.


* How to Use the Program
1. Follow and copy the facial expressions in each stage and make sure you concentrate on the images and the messages provided.
2. NeverSmoking relies on the natural and instinctual function of the human brain, which is facial expression recognition, to activates the mirror neurons. Thus, we encourage you to play the program in a place where there is minimum distraction to the visual images and where it is not too loud. (The program itself does not have any sound effect in order to help the user concentrate on the visual expressions.)

Note: This application was especially designed for smoking cessation therapy. The application contains unpleasant images related to smoking cessation.

* NeverSmoking may be ineffective to the following people. 

Those who have no intention of quitting smoking, those who have prosopagnosia, those who are psychologically instable (ex. Suicidal etc.), those who are doubtful, those who have psychological disorder or have difficulty concentrating on the screen etc. 

* NeverSmoking - Patent / Trademark / Service mark application

Addiction Therapy Using Disgusted Facial Expression and Cause Disgusting.

The management, use, name etc. of this program is under the protection of patent law, trademark law, copyright law.

Please refer to the website http://www.NeverAddict.com or contact serangmind@gmail.com for questions regarding the program,

Copyright (c) 2009~2016 NeverSmoking - SR Mind Institute / NeverAddict.com, All Rights Reserved.

( no smoking app, stop smoking, quit smoking, smoking cessation )

2. NeverSmoking relies on the natural and instinctual function of the human brain, which is facial expression recognition, to activates the mirror neurons. Thus, we encourage you to play the program in a place where there is minimum distraction to the visual images and where it is not too loud. (The program itself does not have any sound effect in order to help the user concentrate on the visual expressions.)

Note: This application was especially designed for smoking cessation therapy. The application contains unpleasant images related to smoking cessation.

* NeverSmoking may be ineffective to the following people.

Those who have no intention of quitting smoking, those who have prosopagnosia, those who are psychologically instable (ex. Suicidal etc.), those who are doubtful, those who have psychological disorder or have difficulty concentrating on the screen etc.

* NeverSmoking - Patent / Trademark / Service mark application

Addiction Therapy Using Disgusted Facial Expression and Cause Disgusting.

The management, use, name etc. of this program is under the protection of patent law, trademark law, copyright law.

Please refer to the website http://www.NeverAddict.com or contact serangmind@gmail.com for questions regarding the program,

Copyright (c) 2009~2016 NeverSmoking - SR Mind Institute / NeverAddict.com, All Rights Reserved.

title: Alex AI – Quit smoking
description:
Join the thousands of others using Alex to become smoke-free and live healthier lives!

Alex is your AI companion supporting you as you become smoke-free and start a new healthy lifestyle. Alex provides tools for you to cut down on smoking and understand why you smoke. The core of Alex uses scientifically proven therapy methods based on CBT.

With Alex, you will:
• Create a personalized plan to become smoke-free
• Cut down on cigarettes each day as your work towards your smoke-free date
• Understand what emotions or situations trigger you to smoke
• Handle your cravings with helpful tools and hacks
• Learn more about your smoking habit and how to live healthier
• Track your progress once you are smoke-free
• Get back on track if you relapse

FREE VERSION – Free forever, without ads and including the core features for becoming, and staying, smoke-free. 

ALEX PREMIUM – To maximize your chances of success, upgrade to the Premium version, including additional features. Have a look at this option in-app!

Ready to get started?

—

Alex is CE-certified and registered as a Class 1 Software Medical Device.

recentChanges: Alex is now packed with Habit Hacks to help you handle your cravings to smoke. Tap “I’m craving” to get the best recommendation from Alex for your specific triggers. Use Habit Hacks as you become smoke free, and to stay smoke free.
comments: It helped me quit smoking along with nicotine replacement therapy and counseling sessions. It's worth the $20 but barely. Super glitchy and laggy. I'm glad I actually quit smoking before it started acting strange. Was fine at first but now it's barely usable. Definitely won't renew the subscription since I only use it now to track how long it's been since I smoked and how much money I've saved. I can do that with a calendar. TL;DR It helped but other things I did helped more. Barely usable now

It was pretty buggy, but usually the ole close/reopen trick fixed it. The information and structure of the app was AWESOME. My only suggestion would be to add a "how do you feel after smoking a cigarette" section in the daily logs. Recognizing when it went from "this makes me feel better" to "wow I feel dizzy, sick, and generally terrible" was significant for me.

Lack of transparency made me uninstall immediately. This is a paid app, you require money to use it. Not "in app purchases," you must pay for the app period. What you do get for free is used storage space and an icon.

Is not clear in any info on here before you download that this is a billed app, either monthly or yearly and that there is a free 7 day trial but only if you sign up for the yearly plan. Start being more transparent and you will get more people to download, pay, and use your app.
I just got this app and it was going great and really helping until it wasnt. I keep getting an error message and can't get back to it. I think I want my money back if it continues this way

title: Smoke Free: Stop, Quit, No Smoking - Quit Tracker
description:
Smoking is a lifestyle choice. Once you take up smoking life starts to adjust around cigarettes, lighters and ashtrays. Between the holes in our shirts and stains on our teeth we keep on losing the image of life without smoking.

Let me repaint the picture for you… It used to be awesome, we used to be free, we used to be healthier, we used to be more fun in general. We didn't need the support of a cigarette to make friends or socialize, our bowel movements occurred without the Smokey intervention and the air in our house used to be fresh and aromatic.

We at Wellness Labs are passionate about Wellness and of course the idea of Quit Smoking app was always on the drawing board; so we finally present you Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker an app imagined by not one but many former smokers for all of you out there who want to liberate themselves from Smoking.

Want to quit smoking and live long? To get motivated, you need a powerful or personal reason to quit smoking and live strong. Quit smoking can lower your chance of getting lung cancer or any heart disease . You can be smoke free slowly by using our Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker app and keep the track of your health and the money you save. 

The following are the features of Smoke Free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit tracker:

- Simple and Elegant User Interface
- Slow Smoking Quit Tracker
- Smoke Free: Life Regained Tracker
- Smoke Free: Health Tracker
- Smoke Free: Money Saved Tracker
- Daily Notifications
- Craving & Distractions
- Smoke Free: Personal Diary
- Smoke Free: Rewards
- Reports
- Smoke Free: Informational graphs


Our Smoke Free model is simple; Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker follows a simple premise that habits can only be replaced and tracking our habits makes us stronger than them. We focus primarily on establishing a connection with the user catering to all smoke cravings throughout the day. Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker establishes a unique distraction mechanism that helps Quitting easy and manageable. 

If you want to quit smoking slowly then Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker offers you a quit tracker. You can set the date of when you will completely quit smoking and keep the daily track of your health like Carbon monoxide, nicotine and oxygen levels in your body as it gradually tapers of cigarette consumption. When your deadline will be reached you will have the record of the money saved and life gained in that period.

Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker also offers daily motivation quotes which also helps to motivate your feelings and thoughts. Be smoke free daily and try not to smoke and you will be rewarded with different achievements and badges which will be unlocked over time.

Once you have decided to quit smoking and install  Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker and get rid of all the ashtrays and lighters, clean your clothes and use air fresheners to get rid of the scent of cigarettes and adopt the alternative lifestyle. This will help you live strong, live long and save your money along the way.

As we said earlier being Smoke Free is a lifestyle choice and a community of like minded people make the journey far more pleasant; we await your feedback to improve and enhance Smoke free: Stop, Quit, No smoking - Quit Tracker to make it your most effective companion on the road to being Smoke Free.

title: Smokitten - Quit smoking !
descriptionHTML:
For Black Friday, Smokitten - Quit smoking ! is 80% off until the 04/12

"Want to quit smoking but nothing seems to work? Want to beat your addiction without breaking a sweat? Try Smokitten!

Smokitten is the first mobile video game, created in partnership with tobacco cessation specialists, to help smokers kiss smoking goodbye! Smokitten is very easy to use. You just have to pick up your phone instead of your fags when you feel strong urge to smoke.

While playing you'll:
- Unlock absorbing and/or relaxing mini-games for your adorable kitten;
- Receive personalised support messages from your friends when you feel like you’re going to give in to temptation ;
- Track your progress over time (number of cigarettes unsmoked, money saved…) and personalise your island with all sorts of plants and trees into the virtual shop ;
- Receive motivating messages about your health improvement and your success ;
- After 222 days without smoking cigarettes, you’ll be tobacco-free, and you’ll learn the secret behind your kitten’s island.

You’ve probably already tried one of these methods to help you quit: e-cigarettes, nicotine replacements (patch, gum, lozenges, inhaler), medicine, alternative methods (hypnosis, acupuncture)… But none of them really worked for you? Why not try out a mobile game that was designed to help people let go of their tobacco addiction? ;-)

A game developed in partnership with addiction experts and a whole community!
This serious game has been developed in collaborration with Centre Hygee (Cancer Prevention Center) and the CIPRET Valais (an organisation specialising in addiction prevention) and a multi-disciplinary team of addictologists and smoking cessation specialists.
summary: Fight your urge to smoke with mini-games and get support from your friends.
recentChanges: Bug Correction
comments: This is a wonderful app to help you through quitting. Very well thought through and charming. Little games to release your stress or to calm down. And while time passes, the little island recovers. Would be great if the cat did more than just stand there.
A useful and refreshing game. How does it keeps being so entertaining and makes you stop smoking at the same time ?

title: Quit smoking
description:
Want to quit smoking but can not? Not enough willpower? Afraid of losing something valuable? Throwing a lot of time and started again? How it all familiar...

"Quit Smoking" application was created for people who understand the benefits of smoking, but at the same time want to be free from addiction to cigarettes to improve the health, saving money and time.

What you will like this app?
1. Establish stable relationship unconscious aversion to smoking, and that smoking, in fact, it is not necessary for a person.
2. Set persistent unconscious link, that a healthy lifestyle - this is correct, it's nice, this should strive for.
3. Find ways of substitution of smoking.

The app contains more than 100 motivational images, 5 actions for substitution of smoking. All you have to do - is to choose the time and repetitions. Every day increase your motivation to be free from smoking.

On the "achievements" page you can track your progress - improved health, saved money, etc.

In the full version you will be available for +100 motivational images and more than 20 actions for substitution of smoking. Also you can set the exact time of repetitions.

The time required for establishing a new habit (rejection of old habits) is 21 days or 3 weeks. If you can be without a cigarette all the time, consider that you have won. The total time to establish a new habit - 3 months. After 3 months without a cigarette you will become a completely different person. You want this?

Finally, be honest with yourself.

title: Smoker Reducer Quit Smoking
description:
Quit smoking cigarettes slowly, over a period of time.  Use the system that weans you OFF cigarettes.

Smoker Reducer can help, and it's completely free, for now.

Cigarettes may have a stranglehold on you.  They may be slowly draining your wallet, choking your lungs, and quite literally, ruining your life.

Let Smoker Reducer be your helping hand in the fight to quit smoking.

***EXCLUDE FROM TASK KILLERS AND RESTART IF YOU HAVE ISSUES!***

HOW SMOKER REDUCER HELPS YOU QUIT SMOKING CIGARETTES:

 - Provides a daily scheduler with reminders of when to smoke.

 - Real-time countdown until your next cigarette.

 - Starts you off with your current habits.

 - Gradually increases the interval between your cigarettes each day.

                             and/or

 - Decreases your daily cigarette allowance depending on the length of your waking hours.

 - Customizable schedules.  You choose when to begin each day.

 - Before starting, you can change your "First Cigarette" time and "Bed Time."


EXCLUSIVE SMOKER REDUCER FEATURE:
 - "Bank" a cigarette if you can't smoke, save it for anytime later in the day!

-  See your lungs get better over time!*

SMOKER REDUCER EXTRAS:
 - Daily Updates for Electronic Cigarette coupons!

 - Compare your current habits with your original habits.

 - See how much money you spend, and, if you continue using the schedule, how much you can save.

 - Earn achievements along the way.

 - Post your achievements to Facebook and get family and friends to support you!

****If you experience difficulties, re-install and REMOVE FROM TASK KILLERS before starting the program again!****


Read more about the system at:
www.smokerreducerandroidapp.com

Smoker Reducer Permissions:
 - Internet access : Ads.
 - Access Network State : Ads.
 - Storage : Saves user preferences
 - Phone calls : Gets User Location
 - Boot at startup : Sets your alarms.
   -  You can kill the app once your phone boots!
 - Modify SD card : Creates error report if crashing.

In order to quit smoking cigarettes, it is often necessary to break both a physiological and psycological addiction.  The success rate of those who quit smoking against those who could not kick the habit isn't in your favor.

title: Breathe Now - Stop smoking
description:
Breathe Now - Stop Smoking is an app that helps you to quit smoking and save money.
Quit smoking is not easy, it's a daily struggle. That's why an app is useful to help you every day.

*** Track your cigarette consumption ***
With interactive charts you can report the number of smoked cigarettes and the costs involved. Watch your consumption by week, month or year. When you don't smoke you can also see a preview of the savings you can make.

*** Reduce your consumption ***
Discover messages of support to overcome the urge to smoke. More than 35 messages of support are available to resist against the cigarette. In addition, you can suggest new.

Also available, the weather of your consumption. Depending on when you smoked your last cigarette, the weather fits. If you just smoked, you have a gloomy weather, snow or lightning. After a few hours you will have a beautiful sun or a refreshing wind.

*** Statistics to be informed ! ***
Statistics help to answer questions that you ask.
How long I quit smoking ?
How many cigarettes I have smoked ? How much it costed me?
How many cigarettes I didn't smoked ? How much money I have saved ?

*** Achievements ! ***
It is important to set goals. There are 70 achievements to unlock (33 in the free version) to stay motivated. They are divided into 4 categories: Consumption, Health, Smoke free, Resistance.

*** Share your progress ! ***
Tell your loved ones that you have stopped smoking . Share your progress and unlocked achievements. You can share via SMS, email and your favorite applications.

It's time to breathe ! The time to be healthy and save money !
No more cigarettes, no more tobacco !

Try Breathe Now - Stop Smoking to quit smoking and save money.
This is the full version with widget and without ads.

If you have comments or suggestions, do not hesitate to contact us :
breathenow.android@gmail.com

title: Stop smoking tracker
description:
Stop smoking tracker
Are you planning to stop smoking or reduce the number of cigarettes you smoke every day?
This is the best health decision you may be making today with your life. Cigarette smoking causes bad side effects in which some are life threatening. Cigarette smoking causes early aging, heart health problems, respiratory diseases,infertility, poor oral hygiene and many types of cancer.
Stop smoking tracker has been created to help you quit smoking by keeping records and providing you with tips on how to successfully become a smoke free person.

Key features:
- Track how much time has passed since the last cigarette of your life
(days, hours, minutes)
- Track how many cigarettes you have avoided since the time you quit smoking
- Track how much time and money you have saved
- Track your health progress - blood pressure, carbon monoxide level, risk of heart attack,etc.
- Diary - keep a diary of events or health improvements
- Personal goal - How would wish to spend your stop smoking savings?
- Export your diary into your device storage 
- Share your smoking status to family or friends via social media apps

Nicotine withdrawal is a big challenge because of the addiction it causes to smokers. Before you mark the first day of quitting smoking you need to set up your top reasons to quit smoking in the diary.
