title: ProLungs - Quit Smoking Effectively
description:
Cigarette smoking is the single biggest avoidable cause of death and disability in developed countries. Smoking is now increasing rapidly throughout the developing world and is one of the biggest threats to current and future world health. For most smokers, quitting smoking is the single most important thing they can do to improve their health. Encouraging smoking cessation is one of the most effective and cost-effective things that doctors, and other health professionals can do to improve health and prolong their patients’ lives.

ProLungs will help you achieve the goal of quitting smoking permanently. Quit smoking is one of the hardest behavioural change, specially for chain smokers. This application is made for both light and chain smokers to help them effectively with tested methods. Some of the functions are:

•	Quit Now
Quit now button is placed in homepage. If the user presses and starts quitting, a timer as well as another button named “Panicking now” will replace the button and it will keep on running as long as the user presses the panic button and marks “smoked”. The code segment for the timer chronometer is given below.

•	Add smoking data
By pressing the “Add smoking data” button in homepage, user can add new smoking information (amount smoked, time) and the data will be saved in database and user and check the data from monitor activity. 

•	Notification 
The app will send notification if the app didn’t open for more than 12 hours to the notification tray with vibration and notification tone (Can be turned off from OS settings, not from the app). If the user logs out from the app, there will be another notification telling the user to keep logged in.

•	Find nearby Counselors
User can check nearby smoking cessation counselors available from his/her location in a map view. 

•	Reward module
This function takes data from quit now function and shows reward according to the timer count. Every time the user starts quit now function, reward module restarts from the beginning and the achievements unlock after the quit timer completes certain time. 

•	Breathing Test
As user need to try breathing test while signing up, the test data is saved in database. After started using the application user can retake the breath timer test to check improvement from the monitor activity.

•	Monitor Progress
The monitor progress can show users how much progress is made, how many rewards and milestone completed and also shows statistical data as chart view.

Good app, lot's of useful functions, very effective distraction options.

title: Quit Smoking Hypnosis
description:
This is a self-contained audio app containing Coach Malte Lange’s “Quit Smoking” hypnosis audiobook. 

The hypnosis is an effective method for anyone wishing to quit smoking. The app includes coaching, hypnosis, experience, advice, effective strategies and various motivational tools. 

Satisfied customers testimonials: 

With this app you get: 

- A 60-minute “Quit Smoking” hypnosis session developed and recorded by Coach Malte Lange, who has appeared on TV2’s “Go’aften Danmark” and in the Danish tabloid newspaper Ekstra Bladet 
- All the tools for a truly successful smoking cessation 
- Motivation to become smoke-free 


The app is easy to use and offers fast, tangible results. Instructions on how to best use the app are included. This is a super-simple app that anyone can figure out how to use. 

IMPORTANT: Never use this app while driving, operating machinery, or any other task which requires your attention. 

For best results, listen to the program with headphones while lying in a comfortable place where you cannot be disturbed.

title: Easy Stop Smoking: Quit Today
description:
Tried to quit smoking before and failed? Then this app is for you! Easy Stop Smoking is one of the simplest and most effective ways to quit smoking. And you can download the app for less than the price of a packet of cigarettes!

Within 30 minutes you can become a non smoker.

The app has been created by award winning UK hypnotherapist Darren Marks and has already helped tens of thousands of people successfully quit smoking and received rave reviews worldwide.

Don’t worry if you’re new to hypnotherapy, we provide lots of tips and guide you along the way to a successful hypnosis experience.

APP FEATURES:
----------------------------

- Easy Stop Smoking state of the art hypnosis sessions
- Support on how to use the app
- Lots of new tips to help you quit smoking

We have also included 3 other powerful hypnosis session by Darren Marks to help you 

1) Relax Completely
2) Release Limiting Beliefs & Decisions
4) Be Successful & Achieve Your Goals

---------------------------------------------------------

So download our pro Easy Stop Smoking app now and start enjoying life as a non smoker!

"I came out of hypnosis feeling only the most distant desire to have a cigarette. And the feeling continued through working days, visits to pubs and restaurants. I wasn't smoking and I didn't mind a bit.” Jane Feinmann, Award Winning Pro Medical Journalist. - Medicine Today

Hypnosis can't make you stop or quit smoking against your will but if you're determined to stop this pro App will make it much easier and even a relaxing, empowering and enjoyable process.

Find out more information on Darren Marks and his award winning hypnotherapy apps at hypnosisappstore.com

We’re passionate about helping people use self hypnosis to quit smoking and your feedback is important to us. So please email us at info@hypnosisappstore.com with any questions of feedback. 

Download Easy Stop Smoking now and enjoy life as a non smoker!

title: Grounded: Quit Weed – Stop Smoking Cannabis
description:
Looking to quit cannabis for life?
Or are you looking for a weed tracker that will help you take a tolerance break?
You need Grounded: Quit Weed - the #1 quit weed app. Dedicated to helping you quit weed or to take a tolerance break, the app can help you stay smoke-free or quit your habit completely. Whether you’re here to quit cold turkey or to take a tolerance break (T-break), we have all the quit cannabis tools you need.

📛STOP USING & TRANSFORM YOUR LIFE✅
Although weed / marijuana is nowhere near as destructive or as addictive as a cigarette (not even close!), and the plant itself has been noted to contain many health benefits and many other uses such as hemp, and CBD, there is a growing number of findings that a percentage of its users can become addicted to it. 
THC in marijuana may not be physically addictive, but users can become dependent on it for a number of reasons. Dependence can range from, avoiding life problems, and boredom to dealing with anxiety, and depression. If marijuana has caused a negative impact on your life, Grounded can help you quit smoking, vaping and transform your life. 

✖️OR TAKE A SHORT BREAK
We also recognize that some users who would like to use Grounded are not life long quitters but may just want to take a short break to increase their tolerance, or to flush the THC out of their system. We have provided tools to help them track breaks also. Grounded provides all the quit tracker tools and resources needed for users on all sides of the 420 spectra. With our weed tracker and quit smoking app you are in complete control of how you consume your weed.

👍HOW IT CAN HELP YOU
- Our quit cannabis journal gives you a health stats section that includes a list of withdrawal symptoms and how long until the symptoms will be gone
- Health stats sections also track how long until your tolerance is reset. Your cannabinoid receptors need to be reset for THC to be fully effective
- Use our weed tracker to log your daily feelings. This helps you learn more about your cravings.
- Count how long you’ve stayed away from cannabis. Our precise quit cannabis tracker will calculate even the seconds.
- Watch your money grow because of how much you’ve saved from quitting cannabis.
- Stay motivated and get rewarded with achievements for the amount of time you’ve been able to quit cannabis.

Now the time has come to stay weed smoke-free and reinvent your everydays.
Try the best quitting cannabis/tolerance break weed apps in the app store and you won’t be disappointed!
👉Download the #1 quit weed journal & habit tracker app for free!

comments: This is the only thing that helped me achieve successfully quitting!!! Being able to see the hours minutes days and weeks its been was such an inspiration. Being able to see the different levels of detox was amazing as well and Being able to see how long it takes to get to those levels of detox and what those levels actually meant was great. Definitely recommend if you're trying to quit smoking weed.

Have to knock off a star for the extremely frustrating and buggy experience on Android. The timer works, but the text above is cut off halfway. I could list many things that are wrong with this, although I am aware that the developer is working on it. Despite this, it's still a very good app and I highly recommend it to others.

It seems like a really good app but I'm very frustrated as I purchased Grounded Plus to unlock the other features, for $6.50AUD, and now it won't let me access the other features.. it just keeps asking me to pay for it again :( Can someone please help me out.

Really like the look and the data choices but when I try to check in (log a session) when I choose to enter some info, a screen pops up offering a health purchase for 3.99 and if I choose not to purchase it, im taken straight back to the start screen and my entered data is lost. Theres no way to check in without purchasing. 1 star for seemingly forced purchase.

I am on day 2 of a T break and this app is rely helping me stay focused and understand my relationship to cannabis. There is a slight bug though. I can't scroll through the text boxes in-app. I can see there is more in the box but I can't scroll to finish reading. Other than that it is wonderful! I would highly recommend payi g for the health tracking, that is my favorite part.

title: Quit Smoking

This is the stop smoking app that you were searching for. Many different, evidence-based, techniques to help you become - and stay - smoke free. See how much money you've saved, how many cigarettes you've not smoked, how long you’ve been smoke free and how your health is improving.

All this is free to use and entirely free of ads. If you need extra help giving up smoking our guide could be just what you need.

title: Quit Right - Quit Smoking Now - Stop Smoking
description:
The QUIT RIGHT App will help you stop smoking comfortably, successfully, and permanently, for FREE.  It is an evidence-based, personalized program by physicians and other experts, which provides the best information you need to stop smoking forever. 

QUIT RIGHT was written by Dr. John Hodgkin and his medical team who have been at the forefront of smoking cessation research and treatment for over 35 years.  Dr. Hodgkin trained at the Mayo Clinic and served for 20 years as Medical Director of the Smoke-Free Life program, affiliated with St. Helena Hospital in California, which is a top stop smoking program with one of the highest success rates in the world. 

QUIT RIGHT makes it easier to quit smoking because it shows you how to properly use medications to stay comfortable while you quit and includes other key quitting strategies.

This proven app provides the strategies you need to quit smoking for good, including behavioral skills training, proper use of medications to suppress and eliminate destructive nicotine withdrawal symptoms, and the role of exercise, nutrition, and spirituality. 

QUIT RIGHT includes a personalized pathway to help you successfully quit smoking and keep track of your improvement in health along the way.

Stop smoking experts provide answers to the most frequently asked questions, based on the best scientific information available. 

The QUIT RIGHT app helps you quit smoking with: 

   - Evidence-based information about how to quit smoking comfortably

   - Content written by physicians and other stop smoking experts

   - Motivational and wellness tips

   - Features to track your symptoms and use results to adjust your medication dosages

   - Tools to make it easier to stay quit

   - A program that tracks health benefits achieved from quitting smoking, days without smoking, cigarettes avoided, and money saved so you can see your achievements and stay motivated

   - Fun and educational questions

If you want to learn the scientific, proven strategies for how to successfully stop smoking, QUIT RIGHT is the best stop smoking app available! 

QUIT RIGHT is available in English and Simplified Chinese.

With QUIT RIGHT, you can stop smoking COMFORTABLY and PERMANENTLY! Start a healthier, better life with QUIT RIGHT today!

description:
Quit Smoking - Goodbye Tobacco

Stop Smoking, Achieve Goals and Improve Your Health

Quit Smoking - Goodbye Tobacco is the application that shows the health benefits of quitting smoking. After your last cigar your living conditions improve every minute without smoking. Taking off smoking, turning off the last cigarette is the best decision for your health and the health of the people around you, with your willpower you can gain well-being years of life and also save money.

Smoking Cessation - Bye Tobacco has the following characteristics:

- Non-smoked cigarettes
- Lived life expectancy
- Weather without smoking
- Saved money indicator
- Health goals
- Achievements included.
- Simple and intuitive interface
- Totally free

To calculate parameters such as the money saved, the life expectancy earned, the cigarettes you have not smoked or the time you have not smoked, you must enter the date when you smoked the last cigar, number of cigarettes you smoked per day, number of cigarettes Cigarette per packet of tobacco and the cost of the packet of tobacco. At the moment the application will calculate the time that you are going without smoking, the health that you have gained by leaving the habit of smoking and all the money saved.

Includes more than 10 health goals that you can get. The longer you are without smoking, the more goals you will have fulfilled. From having 0% nicotine in your body to reducing the risk of a heart attack. It also includes achievements. These achievements are obtained as you are days without smoking. Get the achievement $ 1000 saved, a year without smoking, no smoking 5000 cigarettes or 20 days of life expectancy won.

Improve health, gain years of life, stop relying on nicotine, personal well-being, end the desire to smoke. You and your willpower can do it. If you used to be a compulsive smoker, you had a need to smoke, to quit smoking, and to stop smoking. This application will remind you of the benefits of quitting smoking since the last cigarette. Stop smoking is easy if you know how to do it. Consult a professional, this application is a great complement to quit smoking and forget your last stint to a cigarette. Quitting smoking is easy if you know the positive changes in your life.

title: Quit smoking tracker
description:
Ready to stop smoking? Quit smoking app help you quit the smoking habit for good.
 
We all know the harmful health effects of smoking. Yet it still doesn’t help you to quit smoking. If you are an occasional smoker or a heavy smoker, it is tough to stop smoking.
 
Smoking is highly addictive and it slowly becomes a psychological habit. The majority of people use smoking as a way to relieve stress and pressure. Many use smoking as a coping mechanism for depression, anxiety, or even boredom. The stop smoking app is designed to help you find different and healthier ways to cope with such feelings.
 
Quit smoking app acts as a quit smoking hypnosis giving you expert guidance to control smoking habits. Quit smoking health tracker which tracks average cigarettes you smoked per day. It shows the decline of the smoking habit and congratulates as you move towards your quit smoking goal.
 
To successfully stop smoking, you’ll need to address the addiction, habits and routines that go along with it. Quit smoking app has the best quit smoking plan to stop smoking with quit smoking tracker.
 
Special features of the Stop smoking app:
   * Quit smoking tracker to help you track the decline of cigarettes smoked.
   * Quit smoking health tracker to help you stop smoking faster. 
   * Smoking health tracker, with smoking cessation and cigarette logger.
   * Quit smoking hypnosis program with best stop smoking quotes. 
   * Smoke-free milestone to celebrate your achievement of stopping smoking.
   * Learn how to stop smoking cigarettes with quit smoking tracker app.
 
Download the quit smoking app free and take firm determination to quit smoking right now.

title: Quit Cigs, Smoking, & Tobacco - Quit Smoking Now
description:
Tobacco addiction is a real thing, and not many people are willing to admit that. Cigarettes and Tobacco is legal, and our culture promotes smoking as something that is cool. It is easy to see why people end up addicted to tobacco. 
 
Quit Cigs, Smoking, & Tobacco addresses the need to quit smoking, and helps you become accountable for making the changes happen!
 
Features:
1. Use our counter to track your progress down to the second.
2. Create your own reasons to quit smoking, or use one of our scientifically based facts about quitting.
3. Change the look and feel of the app with our skins section to personalize the app to what you want.
4. Add reasons why you would like to see yourself succeed and stop smoking tobacco.
5. Our special panic button will help you send a text to a friend that may be able to help you and be an accountability partner.
6. Our badge system allows you to be rewarded for your success.
7. Our distractions section will help you take your mind off of heroin and introduce you to something more positive and soothing.
8. Our built in money calculator will show you how much money you have saved since quitting
9. Our motivational quotes and testimonials will ensure that you are not alone on this process to shake your tobacco addiction. 
10. Our built in time counter will let you know how much time you save per day since quitting. 
 
Here are our top 10 reasons to quit smoking tobacco:
 
1. You will breath easier
 
Carbon Monoxide in the cigarettes blocks the uptake of oxygen in your blood. This improves within hours of quitting.
 
2. Take a free vacation every year with the money you have saved
 
Cigarettes can be expensive. For example, it costs over $3,000 per year for a one-pack-per-day smoker. You will also save money on cleaning expenses, insurance premiums, etc.
 
3. You will look younger
 
Smoking is associated with multiple skin problems, especially premature facial wrinkles and constriction of blood vessels.
 
4. Meet that special someone
 
Surveys show that most single people will not even consider dating a smoker. “Kissing a smoker is like licking and ashtray,” as the popular saying goes.
 
5. Get close to people with confidence
 
The sense of smell is impaired for smokers, but nonsmokers can smell the cigarette use immediately.
 
6. Taste buds will improve
 
As your sense of smell improves, so will your sense of taste.
 
7. Avoid having children who smoke
 
A very strong factor associated with starting smoking is having a parent who smokes. After all, kids do as you do, not as you say.
 
8. Minimize your stress and enjoy all the extra time
 
Don’t stress about where, when, and how you are going to take those smoking breaks, or how you are going to survive long travel times. Use your newfound free time to focus on family, career, and life goals that matter to you.
 
9. Be proud of your smile
 
The yellow film on the teeth of smokers improves every time an ex-smoker brushes his or her teeth.
 
10. Live healthier and longer
 
The body can be more forgiving than you think. The risks of heart disease, stroke, cancer and many other medical problems eventually return to that of a NEVER smoker. Studies show that at ANY age, you will live longer if you stop smoking.
 
Having an issue with smoking is not uncommon in modern society. Unfortunately tobacco/nicotine is a very addictive substance and can cause long term damage. Kick your heroin addiction by downloading Quit Cigs, Smoking, & Tobacco for FREE!
 
This app contains in app purchases.

7. Avoid having children who smoke

A very strong factor associated with starting smoking is having a parent who smokes. After all, kids do as you do, not as you say.

8. Minimize your stress and enjoy all the extra time

Don’t stress about where, when, and how you are going to take those smoking breaks, or how you are going to survive long travel times. Use your newfound free time to focus on family, career, and life goals that matter to you.

9. Be proud of your smile

The yellow film on the teeth of smokers improves every time an ex-smoker brushes his or her teeth.

10. Live healthier and longer

The body can be more forgiving than you think. The risks of heart disease, stroke, cancer and many other medical problems eventually return to that of a NEVER smoker. Studies show that at ANY age, you will live longer if you stop smoking.

Having an issue with smoking is not uncommon in modern society. Unfortunately tobacco/nicotine is a very addictive substance and can cause long term damage. Kick your heroin addiction by downloading Quit Cigs, Smoking, & Tobacco for FREE!

This app contains in app purchases.
summary: The number one app to help you quit smoking tobacco! Overcome tobacco dependence
developerAddress: 2234 Marsh Sedge Lane, Winter Park, FL 32792
recentChanges: Brand new app to help curb your addiction to tobacco and cigarettes. Get rid of your dependency to nicotine.

title: Stop smoking | Quit Smoking | Quit Tracker
description:
“Quit Smoking App”is a free application that helps you quit your smoking habit.
It has a real-life quit smoking process, scientific research, saved money tracking, motivational badges, social sharing, rewards, penalties and many other features.
Everyone knows how bad a habit smoking is,however, we still smoke even after knowing how badly it’s affecting our health. We want you to stop smoking, “Quit Smoking App” is an idea coming from someone who used to be a smoker and successfully let this bad habit go. While going through this tough process, a lot of challenges were faced. We want to make the process of making your life smoke free easy and manageable on your fingertips through this simple app.

“Quit Smoking App” starts off by taking a note of the number of cigarettes you consume each day. It also asks you to provide your average sleeping time per day. Based on this provided information, it calculates the number of cigarettes you smoke in the time you’re awake. This information allows “Quit Smoking App” to provide you with equal interval countdowns between each time you smoke. As we know scientifically that you cannot quit your nicotine urge all of a sudden in a single day. Therefore “Quit Smoking App” has a mechanism to increase the countdown time so that you learn to control your urge. This learning process increases your ability to overcome yourself and limit your dependence on nicotine. Day by day this limit is increased and if you follow the process of “Quit Smoking App”, you’ll rewarded with badges and awards. You can share these awards and badges with your loved one’s on social media and make the process even more interesting with the encouragement of the people following you. Similarly, if you fail to follow the countdown, and end up smoking before the interval time is over, you’re given a penalty. Don’t worry as this penalty is not a big one, it is just a challenge that you’ve to complete and stay a strong believer that you’ll quit smoking. Until one day, “Quit Smoking App” will calculate that you’re smoke free for a specific span of time. This would be the day that you’ve achieved your objective and the goal of our efforts. 

Features of “Quit Smoking App”
Calculate Your Smoke Free Time 
“Quit Smoking App” allows you to calculate the time since your last smoke. The entire concept of this quit trackerapp is to increase your smoke-free time using a gamification approach to make the process easier, interesting and memorable for you. 
Being in Coordination with other participants
“Quit Smoking App” gives its users an opportunity to send requests to other people in their contact list. Once added, a user can not only chat with other users, but they can also compete 
with each other. Hence, we don’t only encourage users to quit smoking, but we also promote socializing through our chat option.  
Track Money That You Saved
“Quit Smoking App” will keep a track of money that you saved while staying smoke free. It will calculate the number of cigarettes that you didn’t smoke and hence ended up saving a handsome amount of money. Apart from this, it also calculates the amount that you spend each day on smoking. 
Award & Penalty System
“Quit Smoking App” will give you rewards if you meet the smoke interval targets. These rewards can be shared on social media. Apart from this, the app is designed to throw a penalty as a challenge your way if you do not meet the smoke free interval target. These penalties are healthy snacks or activities that would benefit your health along with keeping you busy and interested in the whole process to quit smoking.

title: Cigarette Analytics
description:
The aim of the application is to clarify all the issues connected to smoking and to help a person to overcome dependence.


TECHNICAL FEATURES

2 main work modes:
- "Smoking" mode
- "Health" mode

A few ways to add smoked cigarettes:
- "Smoke" fast button
- button with timer recording the time of one cigarette smoking
- adding cigarettes with Smoking Diary with accurate time indication

Data panel on the main screen displays the most up-to-date information in real time mode.
You can display the very data you need on this panel.

The Smoking Diary displays amount of cigarettes smoked per day and allows to add, edit and remove records about smoking.

Goal section allows to set cigarettes day limit, minimum time between smokes and planned smoking quit date. Goals will help you to quit this habit step by step. Notification system will inform you on the possibility of smoking a cigarette or on the moment when you finally need to quit smoking.
A few active goals interact together and if e.g. you have reached the cigarettes day limit as per one goal, the other one will inform you that you have to wait till the next morning to smoke again.

5 widgets:
2 simple widgets (light and dark);
2 Pro widgets (light and dark);
Advanced Pro widget (dark), with a smoke timer.

Simple widget allows to list a smoke without opening the main application, displays an amount of smoked cigarettes per day and time passed from the latest smoke.

Pro widget allows to list cigarettes and displays the same data as the main screen of the application.

Both widgets interact with the set goals and will help you to control smoking according to your needs.

Analytics display shows all the data about smoking for the chosen period of time:
- amount of cigarettes smoked
- average rate of the cigarettes smoked
- A diagram, graphically showing all the cigarettes smoked, with moving average displaying smoking dynamics
- A round diagram showing the percentage ratio of the smoked cigarette brands
- amount spent on cigarettes
- time spent on cigarettes
- tar and nicotine inhaled
- how many cigarette brands you have smoked
- how much time one cigarette is smoked
- how often you smoke
- how much time has passed since the last cigarette smoked
- maximum time without cigarette smoking
- how many times you tried to quit
- all the data connected to the mail goals

Options screen offers a lot of features:
- selection of user's currency, new day start setup option
- managing the cigarettes brand list, with possibility to add, edit and delete (the application database contains more than 400 cigarette brands with the preset data on the tar and nicotine content)
- managing the main screen allowing to set the data displayed on the screen
Goals section allows to set new goals connected to the smoking for better process control
Data section where you can reset all the false data and statistics for the defined time period and also export and import statistics
- feedback screen, where you can ask developer any question or send them comments

Help system shows all main application working issues and makes hints concerning all the smoking information displayed 

Information about what happens to the body and mind of a person who quit nicotine, is showed by the Events System in "Health" mode.

recentChanges: Fixed bug of export/import statistics in Android version >= 6.
comments: I don't see the option to add previous day data in case you forget to add it and that's very annoying. Edit #2 : I was trying to refer to adding data for days older than yesterday or day before yesterday. Smoke diary doesn't particularly work for that.

Excellent App !! It allows you not only to quit, as most 'quit now' apps do, but it also helps to reduce the tar per day/week/month, number of cigarettes, frequency as well as it offers mirriads of other features, such as brands of cigarettes, clear stats, etc. This has reduced my smoking habit by half. What could be better. It's a life/money/dependency saver.

This app is actually really good. Rating one-star because I paid for the full version and contacted the developer because the export-import function is not working the app crashes when trying to export data and this is part of the paid version and does not work. Contacted the developer weeks ago and still have not received any help or response.

This app is very good, allows you to set a quit date and gives guided cut down, records and logs your habit so you can see history graphs etc, great widgets so you can quickly add cigs, ability also to knock off, all in all a good app, the best one I've come across and trust me I've messed with a few on Google play, worth getting the pro for a couple of pound for the best widgets.

Downloaded on September 7, 2019. Smoked 20 cigs a day at least. Today (September 10, 2019), smoked 10. Having that timer is awesome. Only app I have ever found to have one. Knowing how long since you've last had one, you keep pushing an extra 5-10 min. Would recommend to anyone trying to quit.

title: LessSmoking: Quit smoking gradually
description:
** IMPORTANT ** We know the current version is not super great, but we're going to re-launch a completely revamped and improved version on November 1st, 2017. Stay tuned!

This is LessSmoking, the first interactive app that helps you reduce the amount you smoke, day by day.

► Are you tired of trying to quit smoking and failing? Try our gradual method, and success will be 100% guaranteed.

► All the other quit-smoking apps simply display how much money you've saved and the benefits of quitting. But LessSmoking interactively assists you in the process of abandoning the cigarette.

► This is how it works: Every time you wish to smoke, open the app and follow the instructions on screen.

► Quitting cold-turkey is ideal. But as you already know… this is pretty difficult to achieve. Recent studies show that only 4% of cigarette-quitters succeed for 1 year or more.

► We’d like to suggest a different approach: Quit gradually. Using the LessSmoking App you’ll discover that gradually reducing the amount you smoke is easier than you’d think. You can be smoking half what you smoke now, in just a few weeks.

► Our method uses a mix of mindfulness techniques with the latest discoveries in cognitive psychology.

► Check out our website for more information: www.lesssmoking.com

title: DipQuit Pro: Quit Dipping Smokeless Tobacco
description:
The PRO version of the best quit dip app out there, DipQuit. Don't think you're ready to quit right away (cold turkey)? Use DipQuit PRO to gradually quit to help improve your chances of never dipping again!

Quitting smokeless tobacco can seem like a daunting task at first. With DipQuit, we aim to help to you quit dipping one day at a time. 

We keep track of your amount of quit days, the money you have saved so far, the number of lips you would have gone through, and much more. Stay motivated by achieving the available milestones and track how your health is improving over time! Need some encouragement? Check out our live chat where you can talk to other quitters going through the same struggles you are.

Quitting dip isn't easy. Don't do it alone. Use DipQuit!
descriptionHTML:
The PRO version of the best quit dip app out there, DipQuit. Don't think you're ready to quit right away (cold turkey)? Use DipQuit PRO to gradually quit to help improve your chances of never dipping again!

Quitting dip isn't easy. Don't do it alone. Use DipQuit!
summary: Helping you to quit dip (smokeless tobacco) one day at a time.
recentChanges: Fixes for old phones
comments: This app has been a Godsend! I'm a lifetime dipper and haven't ever found a dip specific support app or group. I LOVE all the details and stats tracking how my health is improving and money I'm saving. It's very motivating to stay quit. And the chat feature is priceless so I can share and get support from others who can relate to the struggles of quitting dip. Thank you for creating this awesome app!

Great way to track real progress. Makes you feel like your really accomplishing something. This works for more then just dipping as well. Works with anything nicotine related. Chat really helps when you are struggling.
I didn't quit the first time (no big surprise) and it won't let me reset and start over. Don't waste your money

I imagined it would have a timer for gradual quitting that divides the day with the number of dips. It is not a bad product just not worth the money when some FREE quit smoking apps have better functions for gradual quitting. I will change rating  to a three, two was Abit harsh.
Tried to register an account so I could join the chat, but never received the activation email so I could sign in (not in my spam folder either).

title: Get Rich or Die Smoking Gold
description:
If you like Get Rich or Die Smoking...get the Gold version for less than the cost of a pack of cigarettes!

It comes with additional features and will be improved continously.

* New Design!
* Unlimited chat scrolling
* Emoticons in community
* Notification about replies in the community
* No ads!
* Thank the developer :)
* ... and more coming


Do you smoke?
Why do you spend so much money on damaging your health? Why don't you spend this money more reasonably? This app helps you to stop smoking by showing what you can now afford with the money saved. 

Features:
- Sophisticated reward system
- Configuration of smoking habits, quit time, etc.
- Community to chat with other quitters
- Relapse button
- 2 Widgets displaying your progress
- Support for several currencies
- Manage your products
- Product picture loaded automatically (Internet), via Camera or loaded from gallery
- Detailed statistics
- Enable trophys (time, money, cigarettes, products)
- Track the positive effects on your health
- Share achievements: Share your achievements via SMS, email, Facebook or many other applications.
- Two info screens about costs caused by smoking

Available in English, German, Frech, Hungarian and Polish

Please don't hesitate to give feedback: GetRichOrDieSmoking@gmail.com

*****
Note: If you move the application to the SD card the widget will not work properly! This is a well-known Android problem.

Please rate the App if you like it!

Not with internet, camera, gallery, and default is ugly. Pro's layout stinks in comparison; the original is better. Just mad. This used to be a great 5* app.
Can't add products. No explanation on what to do or how to use
Brilliant app really supports you along the your quit journey

The community needs to be moderated. The first time I posted my stats, another poster tried to use my quit in an attempt to bash someone who was having a hard time with a relapse. I thought the community was supposed to be supportive, but it was toxic and hurtful. Unfortunately, it looks like the toxic posters were allowed to remain while the man suffering with relapse has been forced out. This is disgusting. This app is supposed to help people quit smoking. I want a refund.
Wrote again, still no response! Too bad there's no 0 rating. Awful support!! * I've asked in the email sent few weeks ago... Why can't I add pictures of products?

title: Quit smoking in 101 days
description:
••• Today, you made the right decision. It's a tough one, but that will make it all the more rewarding! •••
The day of your last cigarette has arrived, and quitting starts now, so your health can swing back up. 

Thanks to our free app, get rid of the poisonous addiction that also destroys your finances. Gain back your control over your life and quit smoking now. The initial period will seem hard, and you will be tempted - which is why you need us! 

••• Why quit smoking? •••
•Cigarettes, cigars and any tobacco product puts you at a very high risk for cancer. 
•Get rid of your dependency. 
•Your physical capacities and your lungs will thank you! 
•Save upward of $3000 a year! 
•Reclaim your wasted smoking time and years of your life. 
•You won't have to see daily horrible pictures on your cigarette packs anymore. 
•Become a member of the very select club of smokers who quit for good! 

••• How do you quit smoking? •••
Download our free app, follow our training, say goodbye to cigarettes. 

•••Quit smoking now and download our app! •••
How does the app work?

The app is designed like a sports coach - it supports your evolution in your fight against cigarettes. It rewards each of of your efforts. You can improve and eventually beat the addiction. Be steadfast! 

If you yielded to temptation, tell the app so it can adapt your personalized program. 
Keep reading our advice and smart tricks, which will help you overcome your urges. 
Visualize the money you spent as the days go by, as well as the days of your life that you're earning back! 

We all know how important it is to have a healthy lifestyle - that lifestyle has NO ROOM for smoking. 

•••Why use our app to quit smoking? •••
You tried it all but nothing works, you're still a smoker. It may be that the other methods don't work for you. 
Our app may be the solution, as it follows your evolution throughout the day. 
If you feel like smoking, read our articles and advice so you get your motivation for quitting back. 

"92% of smokers quit for good after using our app for 30 days."

Download it now! 

•Reminder: 
Our app is not all-powerful, but your willpower is. 
We are here to motivate you, support your efforts, urge you on, day after day. 
YOU CAN DO IT!

title: Quit For Life
description:
Put the power of Quit For Life® in your pocket. 
Using proven techniques tested over 25 years, Quit For Life has helped millions of people and it can help you, too. Get started today! Connect with 1-on-1 support to beat urges, manage withdrawal symptoms and switch up your habits so you can enjoy life tobacco-free. Our app now brings the power of Quit For Life® right to your phone or tablet -- 24/7.
 
App features include:
• Access to expert-led online videos, quizzes, and discussion boards to help you with your goals in our Online Courses.
• Gain strategies to help deal with cravings through daily tips and tools found in the app.
• Connect with your Quit Coach® through the message center and click-to-call feature.
• Track your progress in meeting the call objectives of your quit program or your quit tobacco incentive (if offered by your plan sponsor).
• See the status of your Quit Medication orders and shipments (if offered through your program).
• View supportive messages to help keep you motivated.
 
Note:
The app requires registration in Quit For Life. To see if you’re eligible, download the app and select register on the sign-in screen.  Benefits are subject to change.
Quit For Life also includes an expert-led online course, support via text messaging, and help with quit meds (which may be available at no cost to you as part of your benefits).
 
Quit For Life is on the web at: quitnow.net
 
Quit For Life provides information regarding tobacco cessation methods and related well-being support. Any health information provided by you is kept confidential in accordance with the law. Quit For Life does not provide clinical treatment or medical services and should not be considered a substitute for your doctor’s care. Please discuss with your doctor how the information provided is right for you. Participation in this program is voluntary. If you have specific health care needs or questions, consult an appropriate health care professional. This service should not be used for emergency or urgent care needs. In an emergency, call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room.

title: Quit Weed
description:
Contrary to popular belief, weed can be addictive. In fact, ~ 15 % of marijuana smokers get addicted to it. If you tried to quit or regulate your use in the past without success, then your relationship with this plant probably is not perfect, and you know it.

If you have trouble quitting weed and you want help and motivation, or if you want to track your progress, download this app. Quitting is possible, and it is worth it. I once was a heavy stoner myself, and I made this app to help other people stop using this drug. I know how hard it can be. 

Features:

STATISTICS

- time not smoking
- quit date
- money saved
- amount of weed avoided
- joints/bong hits avoided
- and more

ACHIEVEMENTS

- get reward for your progress
- over 40 different achievements
- 3 achievement categories

HEALTH STATS

- see how your health improves, this section contains various health benefits you are gaining by not using weed, including a list of withdrawal symptoms and tracking time needed for the symptom to be gone

PHASE SYSTEM

The quitting process may be divided into three phases, where each phase has its own characteristics and problems (withdrawals and tips differs for each phase). The phase system is designed to help you to get through the full detox process, the final phase ends when your body is 100 % THC free. In the you will find information based on which phase you are in right now. 
- tips section for each phase
- withdrawal symptom for each phase, so you know what you may encounter; it is important to know what you may experience so you can prepare

EMERGENCY BUTTON. 

- when you are feeling low or craving hard, you may find it useful to press the emergency button to gain some motivation and remind yourself why you quit in the first place.

Everything in this app is accessible for free. I hope this app will help you on your great journey.

© Michal Janecek 2019

Added health achievement.
Added additional info and tips to phases.
Minor redesign.
comments: I like this app because it requires you to be honest with yourself, I like the way it helps me to know what's going on, my milestones and etc. When I first got the app I relapsed and as the app states there is no relapse option so I deleted it because I was not ready. Now that I really am ready. Im honest about putting my best foot forward to complete this

Ive never written reviews for any apps, but this is THE best app EVER!! I'm currently in the "Psycho phase", what a relief to know exactly what I'm feeling and that it's 100% normal. I feel like I'm losing my mind in this phase especially , but the tips on this app is awesome motivation to push through. Thanks guys. Excellent. Would recommend it to anyone wanting to quit!

I really appreciate this app, there is tons of helpful information. I am only giving it 4 stars because when it pops up an ad for poker stars which is purposely hard to close and which also keeps going into my browser to open the website, it feels like this app is trying to guide me out of my cannibas addiction and into a gambling addiction. That's kinda messed up, or at least has bad optics 🤷‍♂️

I've literally never written an app review in my entire life. But there is so much understanding and kindness built into this app. You're able to read through tips and symptoms you're experiencing, and click through to resources or to read more. You'll find little helpful links and anecdotes sprinkled throughout, and ads are minimal and easily skippable. Feels like it was made with no other motivation but to genuinely help others.

I couldn't hold myself accountable enough to quit alone, but this app helps keep me on track. Every time I want to cave I go look at my "streak" and just seeing the number counting up is enough. The achievements come at the best times to explain how your body is returning back to normal and show your progress in percentages to how long you have until your body is THC clear for example, or your memory rebounds. Really amazing app.

description:
Quit Smoking helps you to quit smoking and track your health and savings after quitting relying on scientific health data. Quit Smoking offers full functionality free of charge. You can monitor:

title: Quit Smoking Tracker
description:
Quit smoking, start a healthy and smoke- free life. Download “Quit Smoking Tracker”, a quit smoking tracker app for your Android device.

Are you tired of your bad habit of smoking? Do you want to quit smoking now and looking to find ways to quit smoking?

Quit Smoking Tracker is a great helper app for quitting smoking because quitting smoking is not easy. It helps you stop smoking by giving you some exact statistics. By using Quit Smoking Tracker you can figure out how much money you can save by stop smoking. It will also enable you to know how much time you spent without cigarettes and It will let you know the amount of life you regained by quitting smoking and how much life you lost by smoking. Our quit smoking tracker app also has some great motivational quit smoking quotes to help you give up smoking. 

Do you want to get rich or die from smoking? I think stop smoking is a better option because smoking kills!

Key Features:

• Simple and clean user-interface
• Universal app, works best on all Android devices
• Quit smoking timeline available
• The number of cigarettes you avoid smoking
• The life you regained and money you saved by not smoking
• From 1 week to 20 years of estimate of money and life expectancy
• You can also see how much life you lost, cigarettes you smoked and money you wasted on smoking
• Free to download and install

There are several reasons you should quit smoking and live a healthy smoke- free life. There are many ways and products in the market to help you stop smoking but still it is hard to do so. Quit Smoking Tracker will help you achieve this goal by constantly motivating you with the health stats such as your blood pressure and heart rate after stop smoking, your ability to taste and smell, blood circulation, coughing, the risk of dying from heat etc.

Quit Smoking Tracker gives you all the motivational stats you'll need to kick the habit because of its side effects. It’s a must- have app on your device if you want to stop smoking. 

We always love to hear back from you. Please leave us a review and rating to let us know what you think about quit smoking helper app. Thanks!

title: QuitNow! PRO - Stop smoking
description:
Are you trying to quit smoking? If you are finding it hard to stop smoking, QuitNow! is made for you.

First things first: you know smoking is bad for your body. Even so, lots of people keep smoking. So why should you quit? When you quit smoking, you improve the quality and length of your life and the lives of the people around you. One way to prepare to successfully launch your smoke-free life is to power-up your phone with QuitNow!


QuitNow! is a proven app that engages you to quit smoking. It aims you to avoid tobacco just giving you a picture of yourself. Quitting smoking is easier when you focus your effort in these four sections:

🗓️ Your ex-smoker status: When you quit smoking, the focus has to be on you. Remember the day you quitted and get the maths: how many days are you free of smoke, how much money you saved, and how many cigarettes you avoided.

🏆 Achievements: your quit smoking motivations: As all tasks on life, quitting smoking is easier when you divide the task into small and easy ones. So, QuitNow! offers you 70 goals based on the cigarettes you avoided, the days since your last cigarette and the money saved. So, you will start celebrating achievements since the first day.

💬 Community: the ex-smokers chat: When you quit smoking, you need to stay within the non-smoking areas. QuitNow! offers a chat full of people that, like you, said goodbye to tobacco. Spending time with nonsmokers will make your way easier.

❤️ Your ex-smoker health: QuitNow! offers a list of health indicators to explain how your body improves day by day. They are based in the World Health Organization ones, and we update them as soon as the W.H.O. does.


In addition, there are more sections in the preferences screen that could help you in your way to quitting smoking.

🙋 Frequent Asked Questions: there are some tips to quit smoking, and honestly, we don’t know where to put them. Most quitters look for tips on the internet, and there are lots of fake tips there. We researched in the World Health Organisation archives to find the investigations they made and the conclusions they had. In the Frequent Asked Questions, you will find all the answers to those questions you have about quitting smoking.

🤖 The QuitNow! bot: sometimes, you have strange questions that don’t appear in the F.A.Q. In those cases, you can ask the bot: we train her to answer those strange ones. If she doesn’t have a good answer, she will contact the QuitNow! crew and they will update their knowledge base, so she will learn the best answers to your questions. By the way, yes: all the bot answers are extracted from the W.H.O. archives, as the F.A.Q. tips.

📚 Books to quit smoking: knowing some techniques about quitting smoking makes the task easier. There's always someone talking about books in the chat, so we made an investigation to know which are the most popular, and which ones can actually help you to quit smoking for good.

Do you have any idea to make QuitNow! even better? If so, please do write to us to android@fewlaps.com

This version of QuitNow is just... better than the one before! We're constantly improving QuitNow, so make sure you always download the latest version.

comments: The night's young! My quit date is October 13, 2020 so I'm just getting prepped and familiar with my new friend/app Will let you know how it goes. ***My initial impression of this app was that of minor disappointment since I bought the Pro version I expected there to be more, instead it's oh so very simple and unimpressive. I thought..If this is the paid app version I'd hate to see the free version.

Absolutely love this app, it really does make all the difference motivationally by providing the incremental progress you've made from day to day. From how much you've saved financially to how many health benefits you've regained, it gives you that tangible baseline to view your progress visually and in real time. It's also simple and automatic, imputing your information is effortless and it will do all the calculations and busy work for you, then provide you will little "rewards" & incentives!
Good distraction for the most part.

Best quitting app and worth the money for PRO. Remember that quitting isn't just something that you do from 1 day to the next. You got to plan and commit. Chewing gum, patches, Chantix, etc... Can help but what really matters is your WILL POWER! I suggest to the developer that after you complete a health goal there is also a timer for how long ago you completed the goal. I think that would be cool to know also.
Love this app. It helped me to quit smoking on July 14, 2019. It keeps track of how many cig. not smoked, ect. It has a chat room to talk to other people who are quitting smoking.

title: Pavlok Quit Smoking
description:
The Pavlok wristband is a behavioral changing tool that helps users break their smoking addiction using a stimulus of their choosing (zap, beep, or a vibration). Pavlok utilizes the latest technology backed by 80+ years of scientific research based on aversion therapy, which helps users associate their bad habit with an unpleasant effect.

Remember each time you had an urge to smoke, a check in (when you’ve smoked), and have the chance to add personal notes to yourself throughout the day. Track, the number of zaps, to better understand when you’re smoking.

title: Benefits quit smoking
description:

title: Craving To Quit!
description:
Craving To Quit is a 21-day program based on a successful smoking cessation program developed and tested at Yale University. A clinical trial of this program delivered as a group-based in-person training over 4 weeks proved to be twice as effective as the gold standard treatment. 

Craving to Quit provides daily instruction through playlists of audio and video tracks, goal-setting tools, and daily reminders. As you progress through the program, we will walk you down to 0 cigarettes/day by giving you the tools you need to successfully quit smoking – one step at a time. 

PRICING

Craving To Quit® offers an unlimited free trial that includes the first four daily modules. Upgrade in app to access all features and the remaining modules on an auto-renewing subscription basis*:


1 month: $24.99

The premium version also includes in-app coaching from our live coaches to help you stay on track. You'll also get access to our exclusive Craving to Quit community, which is moderated by Dr. Judson Brewer MD PhD - a world expert in mindfulness training for addiction. There you will receive support, weekly tips, can track your progress, and can even ask Dr. Brewer questions directly as you go through the program!

Features include:

-Daily training videos 
-In-app coaching (premium version)
-Community access
-Daily cigarette tracker
-Daily goals and stats
-Daily check-in reminders
-Daily night reflection

*PRICING & TERMS

All prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency.

If you choose to upgrade in app, your Craving To Quit® subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of term and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renew at any time in your Google Play Account Setting, but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term.

Need help with the app? Please email ctqsupport@mindsciences.com or go to https://claritasmindsciences.zendesk.com/hc/

TERMS OF SERVICE and PRIVACY POLICY: https://app.cravingtoquit.com/terms

title: To Quit Smoking-insure your life now
description:
Are you trying to quit smoking and want to boost your motivation in this regard? To Quit Smoking is here to offer you a high-quality app that helps you figure out how much money you can save simply by stopping smoking. The app will also enable you to how much time you spent without cigarettes.
 with To Quit Smoking you can also see how much life you lost and how many cigarettes you smoked before quitting.
 This is the perfect motivational and insurance life tool for those that want to break this bad habit right now but find it hard to do so. A great motivator here is the Health tab where you can see the positive effects that quitting has on your body. Thankfully, you will also be able to track the progress and see how close you are to become smoke-free. Your life becomes more insured and secure against the harms of smoking
 This app is a motivational tool designed to help you break your bad habit by sharing the health and financial benefits you’ll enjoy every day you resist a cigarette. Use the app to track how close you are to living a smoke-free insured life, how much money you’re saving, and how much life you’ve regained. There are also a few tips that help you to quickly start enjoying health benefits. To get motivated, you need a powerful, personal reason to quit. It may be to insured  and protect your family from secondhand smoke. Or lower your chance of getting lung cancer, heart disease, or other conditions. Or to look and feel younger. Choose a reason that is strong enough to outweigh the urge to light up.
 Don't hesitate and access the best motivator if you want to quit smoking and insured your life against this bad habit . Download To Quit Smoking immediately and take control over this unwanted habit, remove it from your life!

 Features:
 * Track how close you are to a smoking-free life
 * See how much money you saved and how much life you regained
 * View quit smoking timeline that will give you a better sense of how quickly it benefits your body.
 *13 tips to help you to quit smoking quickly.
 *16 Health Effects Caused by Smoking

title: Quit Smoking
description:
Quit Smoking is a quit smoking application inspired by the scientific researches of the World Health Organization (WHO) on smoking. Thanks to the quit smoking application, you will be able to professionally follow the health developments in your body after you quit smoking. You will be able to see how much you have earned by not smoking. You can see what kind of economic gain you can gain by not smoking in 1,5,10 years. You can achieve motivating achievements. We also have a community. Here you can chat, meet people from 6-7 different countries who want to quit smoking like you, and benefit from their experiences. All you have to do is choose your quit date and join this marathon.

Quit Smoking features
- You can adjust the settings of the application as you wish.
- Real time statistics.
- To be able to follow the changes in health.
- Being able to keep track of your economic earnings.-
- Registering and chatting in the community.
- Achievements.
- You can choose your currency.
- You can adjust the notification settings.
- You can start over.

Remember, you are defeated not when you lose, but when you give up.

title: Smoking Counter & Stats
description:
In a personal effort to control my smoking addiction and try to understand when I smoke most during the day, I created this simple cigarette counter app. Whenever I smoke I log the cigarette and the app keeps track of the time and date. At the end of each week and month it shows the average number of cigarettes you have smoked per day.

I decided to share this app in the play store, so smokers who would like to have more control over their habit can log their smoking activity and see the results.

As of now the stats session is really basic, with a fully functional smoking counter and some basic stats, but as people use it and find this app helpful, the app will get more advanced with more features.

Are you in to start controlling your habit??


*special thanks to http://www.behance.net/fotinipapa for the launcher icon and the logo.

version 1.2

I hope it will be an additional help for you too, to quit smoking!
comments: so the app is great however I only gave 3 stars because of the "end of day" thing.. surely this could be done automatically with the implementation of a clock? or Eg: Start day: 00:00. End Day 23:59 or just a 'pick your timezone' kind of thing so it just does it by itself.. cause at 3am in the morning when I'm drowsy and having that last smoke before falling asleep I won't remember to end the day on the app. Just a thought :)

Perfect for chain smokers or, like me, tend to lose track of how long it's been since my last cigarette. I'm on my 3rd day of tracking now but see how this app is really useful for simple folks who are ready to take back control. Marios Zoutis, Thank you! I'm not sure if you read these reviews, I am very grateful for your gift and decided to give it 5 stars in hopes of helping others. 20 to 22 per day right now.

Installed this app and every time I unlocked my phone there was ads saying "slide to unlock". its really weird. never seen an app do that before. its the only appi installed that day and as soon as i uninstalled and restarted my phone the message didnt come up again.

Works! Easy to use.. Good to stay aware of how many one does actually smoke and even more so the time in between each.. I failed at quitting 100x but with this I'm confident I can challenge myself and reduce bit by bit... Thank you
Easy to use & simple to understand. No bells & whistles. Suitable for all smokers.

title: Quit Vaping
description:
Quit Vaping makes quitting easier by providing progress statistics, a supportive community, and more.

📈Track your progress for any vape device you are quitting
Choose your quit date, enter your vaping habits, and track:
- Time vape free
- Money saved
- The amount of nicotine, e-Juice, pods / disposables, bottles of juice you’ve avoided using since quitting
- Previous vape fee streaks, recorded in chronological order with your stats displayed for each streak

🤝Join the community
Join others sharing experience, advice and more in the forum and live chat. Use the forum filtering system to find posts covering different topics; from experiences with NRT, check-in posts at a variety of dates vape free, advice, success and more
 
🏆Gamify the quitting process
Earn up to 22 badges that mark milestones along the quitting process. You may share the badges to social media or the forum. Badge categories:
- Time vape free
- Money saved
- Nicotine avoided
- Community engagement
 
⚕️Track your health improvement
Track health improvement across a variety of categories as you remain vape free
 
🏷️Exclusive discounts on NRT products
Enjoy savings on the highest quality vaping alternative and nicotine replacement therapy products 

✔️Stay up to date
Read the latest information regarding developments in vaping research and lawmaking

12 additional features that provide a smoother quitting experience by utilizing proven methods and techniques to ease cravings, soothe nicotine withdrawal, and more.
 
Quit Vaping Pro features

- Guided Breathing Exercises and Techniques
- Nicotine Withdrawal Tips

- Savings Goals
- Custom Push Notifications

- No Ads 
- More to Come

Wow. I signed up with my Facebook credentials on Valentine's day 2020. I have logged in repeatedly since then without issue. Today, 8/25/2020 I attempted to login and I can't. FB login is no longer an option. So now my account and all my past activity is gone. Thanks. Good job app developers. I will find somewhere else to encourage people to kick a bad habit. Thankfully this app actually worked when I quit.

What an awful app to have session logouts on, one that you specifically check back on in a few weeks/months and may forget your password or even the original email you use. No ones gonna attempt to hack your quit vaping account, you should only ever create an account once and then never have to log in again
This is the most useful quit vaping app I've been able to find. Definitely recommend! I'm over two months vape free now!
Nice reminder. I like the badges. Been nicotine and vape free for a few months now once 9 installed this app. You can do it!

title: Quit Now: My QuitBuddy
description:
My QuitBuddy helps you get, and stay, smoke free. It's with you through the hardest times with helpful tips and distractions to overcome cravings; tracking systems to chart your progress and all the facts you need to understand the impact smoking has on your health.

Better still, My QuitBuddy is easily customised. You can determine whether you’re ready to quit right now or whether you're intending to do so soon or you have already quit. You can set your own goals, the reasons you're quitting, include photos and recordings of loved ones and even add buddies you can call upon in times of need.


Key Features:

- An option to 'Quit Now', prepare to 'Quit Later' or 'Continue quitting'.
- Home dashboard: Visualise the health benefits of each day you stay smoke free through a series of body animations
- My Goals: set your goals and add the support you need to achieve them
- Visual icons: view your progress, including a count of every day, hour and minute you stay smoke free and how much money you've saved
- My Personal Best: Compares your best 'time-off-smoke' records and motivates you to remain smoke free
- Daily Message: for the first 30 days, you'll receive a useful tip when you open the app;
- Danger Times: nominate your danger times and My QuitBuddy gets in touch to keep you on track
- App widget: set it permanently in your phone's dashboard to count every day, hour and minute of your progress. It will also send you a series of scheduled alerts (such as "Congratulations, it's been two weeks!") to keep you on track
- Distract Me: when craving, My QuitBuddy helps with a range of distractions including - a Fruit Sorter game to occupy your mind and your hands through any moments of craving. Fruit Sorter is a juicy distraction game to help occupy both your fingers and mind throughout any moments of craving.
- Remind Me: a personalised slideshow reminds you why you decided to quit and to stay focused on your goal
- Community: read helpful messages from other people who are quitting with the My QuitBuddy and leave your own for others to read
- Quitline: call the Quitline directly on 13 7848 from the app
- Buddy Up: Nominate friends or family who you can call in the tough times

Quitting smoking can be difficult but My QuitBuddy is here to help you every step of the way. Designed to deliver you support in a way best suited to you, for you to get quit and stay quit.

Be sure to update the app regularly as we will continue to add new features based on your feedback.

comments: Not worth downloading. Tracks the amount you could save with no accuracy. Features lack everything. Waste of time.

It's great. The only thing is if it had a "I just smoked button" in the best times section, not on the main (home) page because it might be tempting to give in and smoke. But definitely if you put it in the section where the trophies are, it'd be a good way to motivate to do better next time because you can see how well you've done in the past. And it would be more intuitive than having to go into profile settings and starting your quit date/time over again.

This app is a great way to keep track of your health and other statistics associated with quitting smoking. Unfortunately I find the colour schemes triggering. Most of them remind me of the old coloured cigarette packets. The interface also seems rather outdated given the ease of use of some other apps out there. There is potential to be a high 4s app but like most things, the Australian Government don't really care.

This app is very helpful. I have not quit smoking but thanks to the saying, Every cigarette you don't smoke is doing you good, I have had over 200 less cigarettes this week than I would have usually smoked. I feel like I am getting closer to quitting every day. The health information is fantastic, the suggestions of distractions instead of smoking are good, and the notes and goal section is great too. This app is very positive in out look.

This app used to be great when I quit a year or so ago. Now it's full of bugs and crashes constantly. update: seriously guys you need to fix this. when a smoker comes to this app looking for support for not smoking and the app doesn't work, it's more of a hindrance than a help. some examples I've noticed: "distract me" only works twice then crashes the app (used to have games? but no more); the community forum scrolling is all wonky; the app only opens for me every second attempt; etc etc

title: Reduce and Stop Smoking
description:
App to reduce and stop smoking, with health stats, motivation tools and badges.


Who is this app for?
For each and everyone who wants to stop smoking, either by first reducing the amount of cigarettes a day or going cold turkey.


How is this app going to help me?
You have two options; deciding to stop cold turkey or start by reducing your daily cigarettes.
If you smoke more than 15 cigarettes a day, we suggest to first break with your 'habit' cigarettes, by first following the reduce program. If you decide to stop cold turkey you have the option to skip the reducing program.

This app will support you with all kinds of extra stimulants by setting goals (for instance financially) which you can use as an incentive and reward yourself.
This app will also show statistics and graphs which will make you aware of your smoking out of habit rather then dependence.

You will see badges when you have reached your set goals and even health stats when stopped smoking completely.

You have the option to stop smoking together with your partner or friend(s) and compare your results by sharing your stats and graphs to motivate each other.


How does reducing work?
The app will need 3 full days of input of your smoking behaviour to be able to calculate your personal reduce program. So these first 3 you just click the 'smoke a cigarette' button when you light a cigarette.

The fourth day you will have a set delay time between your cigarettes. For example 20 minutes. Within these 20 minutes you will see a red screen, with a timer. To fully benefit your reduce program you have to wait for the timer before you smoke your next cigarette. However if the you really need a cigarette and you can not wait for these few minutes to pass you will be able to smoke a 'penalty' cigarette. (Tip don't smoke more than 2 a day.)
Every 3 days the program recalculates your cigarette delay time, based on the smoked cigarettes, and the amount of penalty cigarettes. 
You will get 3 choices for your next reduce step; easy, recommended and difficult.
When you have reached an amount under 8 cigarettes average in the past 3 days, it's time to stop. 

The best proven working method of stopping is picking a date in the near future, as the first cigarette free day.
Inform your friends and family you are planning to quit and ask their support.

For each and everyone who wants to stop smoking, either by first reducing the amount of cigarettes a day or going cold turkey.


How is this app going to help me?
You have two options; deciding to stop cold turkey or start by reducing your daily cigarettes.
If you smoke more than 15 cigarettes a day, we suggest to first break with your 'habit' cigarettes, by first following the reduce program. If you decide to stop cold turkey you have the option to skip the reducing program.

This app will support you with all kinds of extra stimulants by setting goals (for instance financially) which you can use as an incentive and reward yourself.
This app will also show statistics and graphs which will make you aware of your smoking out of habit rather then dependence.

You will see badges when you have reached your set goals and even health stats when stopped smoking completely.

You have the option to stop smoking together with your partner or friend(s) and compare your results by sharing your stats and graphs to motivate each other.


How does reducing work?
The app will need 3 full days of input of your smoking behaviour to be able to calculate your personal reduce program. So these first 3 you just click the 'smoke a cigarette' button when you light a cigarette.

The fourth day you will have a set delay time between your cigarettes. For example 20 minutes. Within these 20 minutes you will see a red screen, with a timer. To fully benefit your reduce program you have to wait for the timer before you smoke your next cigarette. However if the you really need a cigarette and you can not wait for these few minutes to pass you will be able to smoke a 'penalty' cigarette. (Tip don't smoke more than 2 a day.)
Every 3 days the program recalculates your cigarette delay time, based on the smoked cigarettes, and the amount of penalty cigarettes.
You will get 3 choices for your next reduce step; easy, recommended and difficult.
When you have reached an amount under 8 cigarettes average in the past 3 days, it's time to stop.

The best proven working method of stopping is picking a date in the near future, as the first cigarette free day.
Inform your friends and family you are planning to quit and ask their support.
summary: App to reduce and stop smoking, with health stats, motivation tools and badges.
recentChanges:
Swipe Menu

Improved offline syncing

In App Feedback

NEW 3 options in reduce and stop smoking APP
1) Reduce and stop smoking
2) Set date you want to stop within 2 weeks
3) Already stopped

Coughing sound when you smoke a cigarette. With on/off settigs

Offline register cigarettes, and automatically sync with the cloud when back online

Push notifications when reached new achievements
comments: This app is fantastic. It is very motivating to reduce smoking for the reward it suggests buying yourself once enough money is saved. It is simple and easy to use. Every small achievement of one less cigarette smoked is seen as the amount smoked per day is compared in a chart. The app shows the whole journey of quitting from where a person is in the beginning to the amount of cigarettes smoked on the current day. Once the amount you smoke is calculated a delay can be set for longer times.

I really like this app but it would be much better if I could tell it I'm only smoking half of a cigarette, and go back and fix mistakes from the amount of cigarettes a day. I've never counted how many I smoke and after using the app I realized I was way off but couldn't fix it without deleting the app and starting over.

Some more user information would be nice. I am quitting smoking, the last thing I need is the frustration of figuring out how things work. My biggest complaint is the fact that a pop-up locked me out of all user functions and would only release it if I gave it five stars. Not an honest move, guys!
Love the graphing of cigarettes smoked, it helps to be able to physically see how much you are reducing your smoking. Excellent app!
Don't work. Opens until window"rate on play store". After rating in play store doesn't continue. But ads started popping. Unusable junkware.

title: Quit smoking with Quitify
description:
Quitify, your app to quit smoking!

Trying to find the best way to quit smoking based on cold turkey? Quitify is your mate in the most difficult decisions of your life: to quit smoking forever. It gives you advices based on the expert opinion of the AECC and WHO on how to quit cigaretes but also helps you to quit smoking weed. The App allows you to see your progress over time, consumption statistics and view your achievements you have accomplished each day. 
Never quitting smoking was so fun!

Our anxiety room uses different techniques based on audio hypnosis to quit smoking and give you recommendations to help you with the detoxification of your body. 
This version allows you to reduce stress and anxiety caused by nicotine, with more tips and advices, some audios to reduce stress, connect with other community users in your language, meet people in your same situation, share your achievements with your friends, the community, and other curiosities you never knew about snuff and nicotine.

Hop on, sure you get it!

What's new:

* Our experts can give you personalised assistance when you are high on stress. 
* New achievement badges
* Track your quit progres and see your stats
* Natural remedies like cream of tartar and orange juice to quit smoking information added.
* Binaural audios added
* Relaxing sounds added
* Private chats improved
* New notifications with lots of advices
* Sound healing to help you reduce stress.
* Created forum to ask and share doubts with other users.

title: Smokenote Pro - Quit Smoking
description:
The essential choice for health and for quitting smoking successfully! Smokenote helps you maintain your health and happiness by managing your workout, drinking and smoking records. 

Check out the benefits of a smoke-free life. If you find it difficult to quit smoking now, start by recording the number of cigarettes you smoke daily and slowly reduce smoking through analysing your smoking history and triggers.

Input your daily activities into the app, then check your health status by looking at the the number of workouts,  and the number of drinks you had last week.

No one can help you to quit smoking and maintain your health except you. 

Make new healthy habits through Smokenote.

[Main Features]
■ Timer showing duration without smoking/drinking 
■ Detailed records about your workout, drinking, smoking
■ Monetary and time benefits
■ Notification bar and messages
■ Monthly statistics
■ Convenient and elegantly designed widgets

The following benefits are offered when using the Pro version.
■ You can set custom notification messages.
■ You can use 4x2, 4x1 widgets on the Home screen.
■ No more advertisements
■ Support the developer if you successfully quit.
